featureResponse.title: The Abyss
featureResponse.shortSummary: James Cameron's deep-sea thriller about a team of underwater oil drillers who encounter an alien presence.
featureResponse.summary: Brace yourself for a thrilling deep-sea adventure from the director of 'The Terminator' and 'Aliens.' Ed Harris and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio star in this thriller about a team of underwater oil drillers whose attempt to disarm a crippled nuclear submarine leads to a remarkable discovery. Winner of the 1989 Oscar(R) for Special Effects.

featureResponse.title: Acorazado
featureResponse.shortSummary: In this political satire, a man tries to sail from Veracruz to the Florida coast on a makeshift raft, only to wind up in Cuba instead!
featureResponse.summary: In this political satire from Mexico, a man flees poverty and oppression--not to mention his nagging wife--by setting sail from Veracruz to the Florida coast on a makeshift raft, only to wind up in Cuba instead! Starring Silverio Palacios, Laura De la Uz, Salvador Sanchez, Santiago Alfonso and Norma Angelica. Written and directed by Alvaro Curiel.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
featureResponse.title: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle
featureResponse.shortSummary: The madcap moose and his trusty squirrel sidekick head into the real world to thwart a devious plot in this live-action/animated comedy.
featureResponse.summary: The madcap moose and his trusty squirrel sidekick head into the real world to thwart a devious plot in this live-action/animated comedy. Rocky & Bullwinkle have been living off residual checks, but they jump back to active cartoon duty when their nefarious enemies--Boris, Natasha and their Fearless Leader--scheme to dumb down America even further with RBTV: Really Bad TV!

featureResponse.title: Agent Cody Banks
featureResponse.shortSummary: High-school student Cody Banks (Frankie Muniz) must juggle spy-jinks with schoolwork when he's recruited for a mission by the CIA.
featureResponse.summary: High-school student Cody Banks (Frankie Muniz) must juggle spy-jinks with schoolwork when he's recruited for a mission by the CIA. Hilary Duff co-stars as the pretty scientist's daughter whom the lady-shy Banks is charged with wooing as part of his assignment in this high-energy comedy adventure.

featureResponse.title: Alacran enamorado (Scorpion in Love)
featureResponse.shortSummary: An angry young man who joins a neo-Nazi organization is transformed when he falls in love and begins training to become a boxer.
featureResponse.summary: An angry young man who joins a neo-Nazi organization is transformed when he falls in love and begins training to become a boxer.

featureResponse.title: Alice Telefilm Part 1: The First Day of the Rest of My Life
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. Two years after her arrival in Sao Paulo, Alice begins to question her newfound stability and her future.
featureResponse.summary: Part 1 of 2. Two years after her arrival in Sao Paulo, Alice continues her relationship with Nicholas and has begun to look for a place where they can live together. But as she goes about the apartment search and shares in the loves and uncertainties of old and new friends, what she observes leaves her far less certain of her decisions and her future.

featureResponse.title: Alice Telefilm Part 2: The Last Night
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. In the wake of an argument with Nicholas, Alice has a chance encounter that transforms into a deeply affecting event.
featureResponse.summary: Part 2 of 2. Alice's play is a moderate success, and her friends get ready to celebrate. But when Alice discovers Nicholas flirting with a young actress, a fight starts that ends with Alice getting lost by herself in the streets of Sao Paulo. There, Alice hears a phone ringing, and a chance impersonal encounter is transformed into an event that will deeply affect her life.

featureResponse.title: All Access with HBO GO
featureResponse.shortSummary: Experience the best of HBO with HBO GO, HBO's streaming service. Free with your HBO subscription.
featureResponse.summary: Experience the best of HBO with HBO GO, HBO's streaming service. Watch every single episode of your favorite HBO series, and enjoy hundreds of new hits and classic movies--anytime, anywhere. Free with your HBO subscription.

featureResponse.title: American Splendor
featureResponse.shortSummary: Droll, offbeat film about underground comic-book writer Harvey Pekar.
featureResponse.summary: The life of underground comic book writer Harvey Pekar is chronicled in this exceptionally droll film. Told through a collage of dramatic sequences, interviews with the real Pekar and his pals, and quirky animated sequences, this cinematic comic book follows Pekar's career, artistic and otherwise; his marriage; his 'cancer year'; and even his boisterous television appearances.

featureResponse.title: And the Band Played On
featureResponse.shortSummary: Matthew Modine is a young doctor who tracks a deadly epidemic halfway around the world in this medical thriller.
featureResponse.summary: A deadly epidemic is spreading around the world. But when it first began, no one paid attention. Matthew Modine stars in this medical thriller as a young doctor tracking the disease halfway around the world and across two continents--and whose work is thwarted at every turn by fear, official indifference and bitter medical rivalries.

featureResponse.title: Angel Rodriguez
featureResponse.shortSummary: An intimate drama about the complicated relationship between a social worker and the bright but troubled teenager she tries to help.
featureResponse.summary: From HBO Films comes this intimate drama about the complicated relationship between two very different people--a 30-something social worker (Rachel Griffiths of HBO's 'Six Feet Under') and the bright but troubled teenager (Jonan Everett) she tries to help--as they reach respective turning points in their lives.

featureResponse.title: Another Me
featureResponse.shortSummary: A high-school teen finds herself haunted by a scary doppelganger in this eerie creepfest. Sophie Turner stars.
featureResponse.summary: Just when it seems nothing could get worse for high-school teen Fay (Sophie Turner), she finds herself haunted by a doppelganger in this eerie creepfest. As she deals with an increasingly unsettling series of events--both natural and supernatural--Fay's search for answers into her scary double exposes her to a terrible truth about her past.

featureResponse.title: Aquamarine
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two 13-year-old girls try to help a mermaid in her search for true love in this fish-out-of-water comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Can two 13-year-old girls help a mermaid find true love? Claire and Hailey are best friends, but with Claire's mom landing a big job in Australia, the pair fear the worst. Enter Aquamarine, a mermaid in a similar bind: she has three days to prove love exists before she is forced into an arranged marriage. If the girls can help her, Aquamarine will grant them a special wish!

featureResponse.title: As You Like It
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kenneth Branagh's exotic adaptation of Shakespeare's delightful stage comedy in which a courtship plays out in the Forest of Arden.
featureResponse.summary: All the world's a stage--and Kenneth Branagh captures it all in this exotic HBO Films adaptation of William Shakespeare's delightful comedy. Witty, playful and utterly magical, the film centers on the celebrated courtship between Rosalind and Orlando as it plays out against a backdrop of rivalry, banishment and exile in the Forest of Arden--all set in 19th-century Japan!

featureResponse.title: Atonement
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lie tragically changes the lives of three people in this searing adaptation of Ian McEwan's 2001 bestseller.
featureResponse.summary: "Four stars" (Roger Ebert). A lie tragically changes the lives of three people in this searing adaptation of Ian McEwan's 2001 bestseller. James McAvoy and Keira Knightley star as lovestruck teens from opposite social classes. When Knightley's younger sister mistakes a scene between the pair as sinister, it sets off a chain of events that changes all of their lives forever.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Austin Powers: Int'l Man of Mystery
featureResponse.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
featureResponse.shortSummary: Mike Myers is the world's greatest superspy, out to prevent the ultimate plot at world domination courtesy of his devious nemesis.
featureResponse.summary: 'Oh Yeah, Baby!' The world's greatest super-spy is out to prevent the ultimate plot at world domination courtesy of his devious nemesis in this outrageous 1997 comedy. Mike Myers is hilarious as over-sexed, dentally challenged super-spy Austin Powers--while also portraying the megalomaniacal Dr. Evil--in this blockbuster hit that spawned two sequels.

featureResponse.title: Bad Girls
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four bordello beauties take off across the wild, wild West with a posse, an outlaw gang and one lovestruck cowboy in hot pursuit!
featureResponse.summary: When these 'girls' strap on their six-guns, everybody better duck! After one of them kills an abusive client, four bordello beauties take off across the wild, wild West--with a posse, an outlaw gang and one lovestruck cowboy in hot pursuit.

featureResponse.title: Bandidas
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sexy outlaws Penelope Cruz and Salma Hayek go on a rampage in the name of justice in this female-buddy western.
featureResponse.summary: Sexy outlaws Penelope Cruz and Salma Hayek go on a rampage in the name of justice in this western. When a rich man and a peasant become targets of a greedy landowner, their respective daughters decide to get revenge! Privileged and poor become female bandits, robbing banks, intimidating some of the men in their path and winning over others--including a repressed criminologist.

featureResponse.title: Batman Begins
featureResponse.shortSummary: Christian Bale dons the bat-suit of the crime-fighting Caped Crusader in this edgy re-imagining of the comic-book saga.
featureResponse.summary: In this dark re-imagining of the Batman saga, Christian Bale stars as Bruce Wayne, a wealthy heir with a tragic past--and a singular obsession with stopping evildoers. Bruce transforms himself into the Caped Crusader...and it's just in time as Gotham City comes under attack by the devious Scarecrow. TM & (C) 2005 DC COMICS INC. All Rights Reserved.

featureResponse.title: Battle for Terra
featureResponse.shortSummary: A peaceful planet come under attack by the last surviving remnants of humanity in this animated sci-fi tale.
featureResponse.summary: When the inhabitants of a peaceful planet come under attack by the last surviving remnants of humanity, a rebellious young alien girl forms an unlikely alliance with a human pilot to battle the hostile invaders in this animated sci-fi tale. The stellar voice cast includes Evan Rachel Wood, Brian Cox, James Garner and Danny Glover.

featureResponse.title: Behind Enemy Lines
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Navy pilot shot down over enemy territory must rely on his rule-breaking commanding officer to save his life in this thriller.
featureResponse.summary: Owen Wilson stars as a Navy pilot who is shot down over enemy territory and must rely on the rule-breaking tactics of his commanding officer to save his life in this intense thriller. Gene Hackman is the veteran commander who defies NATO orders to send a rescue mission to find his man...and risks his own career in the process!

featureResponse.shortTitle: Behind Enemy Lines II: Axis of Evil
featureResponse.title: Behind Enemy Lines II: Axis of Evil
featureResponse.shortSummary: Navy SEALs sent to North Korea on a secret mission to destroy a missile site end up stranded in enemy territory.
featureResponse.summary: In this action-packed adventure, a team of Navy SEALs is sent to North Korea on a secret mission to destroy a missile site. But when the mission goes awry, some of the soldiers end up stranded in enemy territory and have to fight their way out.

featureResponse.title: Behind the Candelabra
featureResponse.shortSummary: Michael Douglas and Matt Damon star in this film that recounts show-biz icon Liberace's tempestuous relationship with a young lover.
featureResponse.summary: Show-biz icon Liberace's tempestuous relationship with a young lover is recounted in this HBO Films production. Oscar(R) winners Michael Douglas and Matt Damon star as the entertainer and his partner Scott Thorson who lived in Liberace's opulent Las Vegas mansion from 1977 to 1982--a time when Liberace was at the height of his popularity, but remained closeted as a homosexual.

featureResponse.title: Belle
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young bi-racial woman plays a role in the abolition of slavery in 18th-century Britain in this inspiring period drama.
featureResponse.summary: Raised free by an aristocratic family, a young bi-racial woman plays a role in the abolition of slavery in 18th-century Britain in this period drama. Gugu Mbatha-Raw stars as Dido Elizabeth Belle, an admiral's illegitimate daughter who encounters race, gender and class issues despite her rich lineage--and who comes to influence her uncle's position in a pivotal court case.

featureResponse.title: The Best Man Holiday
featureResponse.shortSummary: Long-simmering rivalries, romances and secrets are revealed when college friends gather for a joyful holiday reunion in this comedy sequel,
featureResponse.summary: Get ready for a "feel-good celebration" (Boston Herald), as the ensemble cast from the 1999 hit "The Best Man" returns for this comedy sequel. Getting together for the first time in years, the college friends gather for a joyful holiday reunion, only to find that long-simmering rivalries, romances and secrets are revealed.

featureResponse.title: Big
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Hanks earned a 1988 Best Actor Academy Award nomination for this film about a boy whose wish to be 'big' comes true.
featureResponse.summary: Snubbed by a teenage beauty, a shrimpy thirteen-year-old boy wishes he were 'big'--and presto, his wish comes all too true! Tom Hanks earned a Best Actor Oscar(R) nomination as the boy-turned-man who winds up in New York City where he tries his hand at adult life...which means a real job (in a toy company) and a real girlfriend (Elizabeth Perkins).

featureResponse.title: The Big Fix
featureResponse.shortSummary: Offbeat private eye Richard Dreyfuss tackles a tangled murder case in this humorous tale.
featureResponse.summary: Humor and suspense run neck and neck as an offbeat private eye takes on a tangled murder case. Richard Dreyfuss is Moses Wine, Private Detective. Tough and cynical, funny and romantic, he's a gumshoe with no money, a flighty ex-wife, a Marxist grandmother, and two young sons.

featureResponse.title: Black Nativity
featureResponse.shortSummary: Langston Hughes' beloved musical is brought to the big screen in this uplifting holiday film.
featureResponse.summary: Langston Hughes' beloved musical is brought to the big screen in this uplifting holiday film. Unable to support her teenage son, a young mother sends him to Harlem to live with his estranged grandparents, where he struggles to adapt and faces temptation as Christmas approaches. 'Toe-tapping holiday fare' (USA Today).

featureResponse.title: Black Widow
featureResponse.shortSummary: Debra Winger plays a federal agent who becomes personally involved in the case of a sexy siren who preys on wealthy men.
featureResponse.summary: She mates...she kills...then spins a web of fatal attraction for her next victim. That's a beautiful schemer's pattern in this thriller--until a mousy Justice Department investigator gets wise to her game. Debra Winger stars as Alex, a Federal agent who sees an odd pattern in the deaths of several rich men, and probes her way right into the newest web of Theresa Russell.

featureResponse.title: Blade Runner
featureResponse.shortSummary: Harrison Ford stars in this sci-fi classic as a burned-out future lawman charged with hunting down a group of human 'replicants.'
featureResponse.summary: The year: 2019. The place: Los Angeles, now a garish, bleak landscape. Harrison Ford is the blade runner--a lawman charged with hunting down illegal artificial humans known as 'replicants' in this gripping sci-fi adventure, which features stunning Oscar(R)-nominated sets and special effects, plus an unforgettable score by Vangelis. Co-starring Rutger Hauer and Sean Young.

featureResponse.title: Blue Streak
featureResponse.shortSummary: Martin Lawrence is a paroled thief who discovers the building where he hid a stolen diamond has been turned into a police station.
featureResponse.summary: Diamonds are forever causing problems for wisecracking safecracker Martin Lawrence. When a heist goes bad, Lawrence hides the booty--a rock worth $18 million--in a building's air vent before being apprehended. Paroled two years later, he returns for the jewel, only to discover that the place where he has hidden it is now a police station!

featureResponse.title: Bogus
featureResponse.shortSummary: Whoopi Goldberg is a serious career woman until she becomes foster mother to a boy with an imaginary friend.
featureResponse.summary: Irresistible as ever, Whoopi Goldberg shines as Harriet Franklin, a strong and serious career woman who thinks she knows it all--until she becomes an unexpected foster mother. When seven-year-old Albert comes along with his imaginary pal Bogus (Gerard Depardieu), Harriet finds out just how marvelous life can be in this refreshingly sweet and utterly endearing comedy.

featureResponse.title: The Book Thief
featureResponse.shortSummary: A little girl in Nazi Germany learns to survive the horrors she experiences through reading in this adaptation of the acclaimed novel.
featureResponse.summary: A little girl in Nazi Germany learns to survive the horrors she experiences through reading in this adaptation of the acclaimed novel. Taken in by foster parents, young Liesel is able to overcome illiteracy and great loss with help from her kindly foster father (an exceptional Geoffrey Rush) and a young Jewish refugee the family agrees to hide. Emily Watson co-stars.

featureResponse.title: The Break-Up
featureResponse.shortSummary: Vince Vaughn and Jennifer Aniston play an out-of-love couple whose shared apartment becomes the battlefield in their two-person war.
featureResponse.summary: Opposites repel in this darkly comic tale of a relationship gone awry. Vince Vaughn is a guy's guy who runs a family business; Jennifer Aniston is an elegant art-gallery manager who likes things to look perfect. The two fall in love and buy a condo together...and then fall out of love, continuing to live in the apartment that turns into the battlefield of their two-person war.

featureResponse.title: Bring It On
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kirsten Dunst shakes her pompoms as the new captain of a high school cheerleading team leading her squad to a national championship.
featureResponse.summary: Kirsten Dunst shakes her pompoms in this "smart and sassy" (Los Angeles Times) hit. Dunst plays the new captain of a high school cheerleading team leading her squad to another national championship, only to discover that her predecessor stole their routines from a rival school.

featureResponse.title: Broken Flowers
featureResponse.shortSummary: An impassive man journeys to find out which of his former lovers sent him an anonymous letter telling him that he has an 18-year-old son.
featureResponse.summary: Bill Murray delivers 'a lesson in minimalist acting' ('Variety') in this amusing and offbeat film. Murray portrays Don Johnston, an empty shell of a man who undertakes a journey to meet with several of his quirky former lovers in order to solve a peculiar mystery: which one sent him an anonymous letter telling him that he has an 18-year-old son?

featureResponse.shortTitle: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
featureResponse.title: Bury My Heart at Wounded Knee
featureResponse.shortSummary: Epic 'HBO Films' adaptation of Dee Brown's book about the subjugation and cultural extermination of the Sioux tribe in the 19th century.
featureResponse.summary: Beginning just after the bloody Sioux victory over General Custer at Little Big Horn, this epic 'HBO Films' adaptation of Dee Alexander Brown's nonfiction masterpiece intertwines the unique perspectives of three characters--Charles Eastman, Sitting Bull and Senator Henry Dawes--while detailing the sprawl into the American West that tragically affected American Indian culture.

featureResponse.title: Bye Bye, Love
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three divorced buddies experience the pains and pleasures of single life in this lighthearted look at divorce from the male perspective.
featureResponse.summary: Three divorced buddies experience the pains and pleasures of the single life in this lighthearted look at divorce from the male perspective. Gathering each weekend at the local McDonald's to pick up the kids from their ex-wives, they're full of plans...but things always seem to go wrong. But as the pals keep telling each other and their kids, 'that's just the way it is.'

featureResponse.title: Capturing Mary
featureResponse.shortSummary: The young concierge of a spooky London mansion entertains an elderly visitor in this follow-up film to 'Joe's Palace.'
featureResponse.summary: The young concierge of a spooky London mansion returns in this follow-up film to 'Joe's Palace.' When an elderly woman named Mary Gilbert (Maggie Smith) shows up looking for answers to events set in motion by her past experiences at the old house, Joe decides to let her in--and is taken on a journey through the house and the secrets that it holds.

featureResponse.title: Carmina y amen (Carmina and Amen)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A foul-mouthed matriarch from a working-class section of Seville hides the fact that her husband has died.
featureResponse.summary: A foul-mouthed matriarch from a working-class section of Seville hides the fact that her husband has died in order to receive his bonus paycheck.

featureResponse.title: Car Wash
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lively gang of employees and pals spend a bubbly day running an L.A. car wash in this 1976 comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A lively gang of employees and pals spend a bubbly day running an L.A. car wash in this 1976 comedy. Written by Joel Schumacher, this comedy follows the staff of the DeLuxe Car Wash on a busy afternoon. Comprised of wannabe actors, a preacher, a drag queen and a harried boss, the staff gives car owners more spectacle than suds when they bring their wheels in for a good scrub.

featureResponse.title: Center Stage
featureResponse.shortSummary: Young dancers experience competition, stress and problems at a New York City ballet school.
featureResponse.summary: Young dancers experience competition, stress and problems of all kinds offstage--and pure delirium onstage--in this 'rousing pop entertainment' ('The New York Post') from Nicholas Hytner ('The Object of My Affection') about students of varying backgrounds and talent at a New York City ballet school.

featureResponse.title: Changeling
featureResponse.shortSummary: Angelina Jolie delivers a riveting performance in Clint Eastwood's gut-wrenching drama about a mother's search for her missing son.
featureResponse.summary: Angelina Jolie delivers a riveting, Oscar(R)-nominated performance in this gut-wrenching drama about a mother's search for her missing son. Clint Eastwood directed this intimate film that chronicles the notorious 1928 'Wineville Chicken Coop Murders' and the story of one woman's dogged determination to find her son--and expose a corrupt police force at any cost.

featureResponse.title: Chaplin
featureResponse.shortSummary: Robert Downey Jr. brings Charlie Chaplin perfectly to life in this revealing film about the legendary comedic actor.
featureResponse.summary: Robert Downey Jr. brings Charlie Chaplin perfectly to life in this revealing film that chronicles the life and career of the legendary comedic actor. 'Downey at his best' (Nolan's Pop Culture Review).

featureResponse.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
featureResponse.shortSummary: Johnny Depp stars as quirky candyman Willy Wonka in director Tim Burton's eye-popping adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic children's tale.
featureResponse.summary: Director Tim Burton cooks up an eye-popping confection in this adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic. Johnny Depp stars as Willy Wonka, a reclusive chocolatier who announces a contest in which five lucky kids will win a tour of his factory. The winners, who have no idea what's in store for them, are sweet Charlie Bucket and four of the brattiest children ever to grace the screen.

featureResponse.title: Charlie St. Cloud
featureResponse.shortSummary: Small-town sailing star Zac Efron must choose between love and a promise he made to his late brother in this tender drama.
featureResponse.summary: Some promises go beyond the grave. For one-time sailing star Charlie St. Cloud (Zac Efron), it is just such a promise he makes to his late brother that prompt him to give up his dreams. But love in the person of former classmate and sailing rival Tess (Amanda Crew) force Charlie to make a wrenching decision that will change his life forever.

featureResponse.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Baker clan--Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt and their 12 children--is back for more family fun in this uproarious comedy sequel.
featureResponse.summary: The Baker clan is back for more family fun in this sequel. Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt reprise their roles as Tom and Kate Baker, the proud (and occasionally frazzled) parents of 12 children. This time around, the family gathers for a lakefront vacation that takes a rapid turn for the worse when the rivalry between Tom and an old high-school mate (Eugene Levy) is renewed.

featureResponse.title: Choke
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sam Rockwell stars in this quirky dark comedy that follows the eccentric life of a swindling sex-addicted con artist.
featureResponse.summary: Sam Rockwell stars in this dark comedy that follows the eccentric life of a swindling sex-addicted con artist. Victor is a theme-park performer with a rocky childhood, an insatiable appetite for sex, and a fondness for fleecing the rich after they 'rescue' him from choking fits in restaurants. But one thing stifles his outlandish lifestyle--visits to his mentally mixed-up mom.

featureResponse.title: Cinema Verite
featureResponse.shortSummary: The fact-based story of a Santa Barbara family who were catapulted to notoriety in the early 1970s in a groundbreaking PBS series.
featureResponse.summary: Decades before we had reality television, there was the Loud family. From HBO Films comes the story of the groundbreaking PBS documentary 'An American Family' which chronicled the lives of the Loud family in the early 1970s. The cameras put the Louds in the national spotlight as parents Pat and Bill grappled with their marriage while raising their children.

featureResponse.title: Citizen X
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Russian police detective faces almost insurmountable odds in his search for the most savage serial killer of modern times.
featureResponse.summary: A Russian detective faces insurmountable odds in his search for the most savage serial killer of modern times in this taut thriller based on a true story. Andre Chikatilo viciously murdered 52 women and children--while the government denied that a serial killer existed. But one man became obsessed with the killer and defied the official silence in order to track him down.

featureResponse.title: City Hall
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young deputy mayor finds himself in the middle of a growing storm of crime, corruption and politics in New York City.
featureResponse.summary: A shootout takes the lives of a cop, a mobster and a little boy and casts a young deputy mayor into the middle of a growing storm of crime, corruption and politics in New York City. Al Pacino shines as the charismatic Mayor whose idealistic underling (John Cusack) begins to uncover a shocking web of lies and deceit in the wake of the violence.

featureResponse.title: City of Ember
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two resourceful teens race to save their subterranean city from extinction in this thrilling family adventure.
featureResponse.summary: Life in a futuristic underground city is about to go dark. Originally constructed to save a small group of humans from the apocalypse, the subterranean lair of Ember is powered by an enormous generator that's about to die. With outages growing more frequent, it's up to a pair of resourceful teens to save the populace and its self-serving leaders from eternal darkness.

featureResponse.title: A Civil Action
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lawyer takes on a risky case involving major corporations accused of poisoning a small town's water supply.
featureResponse.summary: In this "gripping, expertly acted" (New York Times) drama based on a true story, John Travolta stars as a Boston personal-injury lawyer who takes on a risky case involving major corporations whose alleged toxic pollution of a small town's water supply is responsible for a large number of leukemia deaths.

featureResponse.title: Clear History
featureResponse.shortSummary: Larry David is a disgraced former exec whose past humiliation threatens to disrupt his new life in this HBO Films comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Larry David stars in this HBO Films comedy as Nathan Flomm, a marketing executive at a start-up company who loses a fortune after a petty argument with his boss (Jon Hamm). The company then makes billions, leaving Nathan publicly humiliated. But even after changing his identity and moving to a small island off the Massachusetts coast, his past threatens to disrupt his new life.

featureResponse.title: Conspiracy
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kenneth Branagh and Stanley Tucci star in this story of the top-secret Nazi meeting to debate the merits of Hitler's 'Final Solution.'
featureResponse.summary: They came to Wannsee as high-ranking leaders of Germany's World War II effort. Two hours later, they left as co-conspirators in the murder of millions of Jews. This is the story of the top-secret Nazi meeting in which fifteen men debated--and ultimately agreed upon--the merits of Hitler's 'Final Solution,' the extermination of the entire Jewish population of Europe.

featureResponse.title: The Constant Gardener
featureResponse.shortSummary: A British diplomat begins digging for clues into the mysterious murder of the wife he barely knew in this thriller.
featureResponse.summary: A British diplomat begins digging for clues into the mysterious murder of the wife he barely knew. Ralph Fiennes stars as Justin Quayle, whose brief but powerful romance with his activist wife Tessa ends in violence. Seeking to find Tessa's killer, Justin's investigation of her death exposes him to some sordid details about her life that put him in danger.

featureResponse.title: Contact
featureResponse.shortSummary: Robert Zemeckis' provocative sci-fi drama with Jodie Foster as a scientist who makes extraterrestrial contact. With Matthew McConaughey.
featureResponse.summary: Does alien life exist in outer space? In this provocative drama, brilliant scientist Jodie Foster believes that we are not alone, and her tireless search for extraterrestrial clues reaps magical and unprecedented results. A visually intoxicating sci-fi movie that inspires even as it fascinates. "Beautifully crafted and involving...positive and uplifting" (Variety).

featureResponse.title: A Cool, Dry Place
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young lawyer on his way up the corporate ladder faces a difficult dilemma when his ex-wife suddenly reappears.
featureResponse.summary: A year and a half after being left by his wife, young lawyer Russell Durrell finds himself finally adjusting to life as a single working parent in a small Kansas town. When his ex suddenly reappears at the same time that he is offered a job in Dallas, Russell faces a difficult dilemma that will change his life forever in this drama.

featureResponse.title: Cop and a Half
featureResponse.shortSummary: An 8-year-old witness tags along with cranky cop Burt Reynolds to catch criminals in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Devon Butler may be only in elementary school, but his bright ambitions to carry a police badge may be realized sooner than he thinks. As a key eyewitness to a crime, Devon holds a big bargaining chip with longtime cop Nick McKenna (Burt Reynolds): he'll tell the police what he knows, if McKenna allows the law savvy lad to join him on the chase!

featureResponse.title: Corazon de leon (Lion's Heart)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lawyer embarks on an unlikely relationship with a charming, successful architect who is barely four-feet tall.
featureResponse.summary: After losing her cell phone, a lawyer receives a call from the man who found it, and she finds herself charmed by this friendly, successful architect. But when they meet the next day, she discovers one tiny problem: he's barely four-feet tall.

featureResponse.title: The Corruptor
featureResponse.shortSummary: Chow Yun-Fat and Mark Wahlberg cops dealing with corruption, deception and violence in the powder-keg that is New York City's Chinatown.
featureResponse.summary: In a place where everyone is on the take, it's up to two polar opposite NYPD cops to find common ground in this riveting action-thriller. Chow Yun-Fat and Mark Wahlberg star as the unlikely partners--both of whom are hiding dirty secrets--dealing with corruption, deception and violence in the powder-keg that is New York City's Chinatown.

featureResponse.title: Crazy in Alabama
featureResponse.shortSummary: An Alabama boy finds himself in a pivotal role between his mad-hatter aunt and a racial situation.
featureResponse.summary: It's a big summer for an Alabama boy named Peejoe. His aunt Lucille swings through town on her way to Hollywood, toting along her abusive husband's head in a hatbox. And a challenge to racial segregation leads to a tragedy that most of the locals would like to ignore. Peejoe finds himself in a pivotal role, taking the side of freedom on all levels, and at any cost.

featureResponse.title: Criminal
featureResponse.shortSummary: A veteran con artist moves from petty crimes to a major heist with the help of a novice crook in this caper.
featureResponse.summary: A veteran con artist moves from petty crimes to a major heist with the help of a novice crook in this caper. Richard Gaddis is a masterful small-time swindler. When he hooks up with Rodrigo, an eager neophyte with a knack for cons, Gaddis spies a lucrative opportunity to utilize their talents...if his meddling sister doesn't get in their way. Based on the film 'Nine Queens.'

featureResponse.title: Cristo Rey
featureResponse.shortSummary: In an impoverished shantytown of Santo Domingo, two half-brothers--one Haitian and one Dominican--clash over their love for the same woman.
featureResponse.summary: In an impoverished shantytown of Santo Domingo, two half-brothers--one Haitian and one Dominican--clash over their love for the daughter of a local drug lord.

featureResponse.title: Cronica del fin del mundo (Chronicle of the End of the World)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Drama and comedy are blended in this Colombian film centering on a retired teacher who fears that the world is coming to an end.
featureResponse.summary: Drama and comedy are blended in this Colombian film centering on a retired teacher who fears that the world is coming to an end, and his jobless son, whose wife has abandoned him after having a baby.

featureResponse.title: The Cure
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two best friends run off together to find a treatment for AIDS in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: Sternly warned to stay away from the boy next door, new kid Erik defies his mother and befriends Dexter, his HIV-positive preteen neighbor. A sincere friendship is formed as the boys develop make-believe cures for Dexter, but when they learn of a Louisiana doctor who might have the real deal, they launch a raft trip South to potentially save Dexter's life.

featureResponse.title: Curse of the Pink Panther
featureResponse.shortSummary: Ever-bumbling Inspector Clouseau has been missing for a year--and the President of France wants to find him.
featureResponse.summary: Inspector Clouseau has been missing for a year--and the President of France wants to find him. But Chief Inspector Dreyfuss, Clouseau's arch-enemy, doesn't want him back, so he programs a computer to find the world's worst detective! Ted Wassbumbles his way around Europe, eluding assorted villains through sheer dumb luck.

featureResponse.title: Dallas Buyers Club
featureResponse.shortSummary: Matthew McConaughey delivers an Oscar(R)-winning performance as a Texas redneck who becomes an unlikely hero to AIDS patients.
featureResponse.summary: Matthew McConaughey won the Best Actor Oscar(R) for this searing film about a Texas redneck who became an unlikely hero to AIDS patients in the 1980s. A hedonistic heterosexual homophobe who contracts HIV, Ron Woodroof (McConaughey) has his eyes opened by the experience, joining a kind-hearted transsexual to import unsanctioned drugs to treat patients desperate for a cure.

featureResponse.title: Dancing in September
featureResponse.shortSummary: A writer and a TV executive deal with romance and the sobering realities of creating an African American sitcom.
featureResponse.summary: A writer and a TV executive fight to 'keep it real' while they contend with the sobering realities of creating an African American sitcom. George Washington is the driven exec; Tomasina Crawford is the idealistic writer who has scripted a hit show. Their mutual attraction leads to passion, but when ratings start to fall, the pair is confronted with some tough choices.

featureResponse.title: The Darjeeling Limited
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three estranged brothers undertake a train journey across India together in this comedy-drama.
featureResponse.summary: Three estranged brothers undertake a train journey across India together in this comedy-drama. Francis, Peter and Jack are united for the first time since their father's death one year earlier and their various quirks and issues soon boil to the surface. As their journey takes various amusing detours along the way, the brothers begin to find healing from their troubled pasts.

featureResponse.title: Dark City
featureResponse.shortSummary: In a dark future world, an amnesiac murder suspect may hold the key to escaping the hellish control of powerful invaders.
featureResponse.summary: Classic film noir blends seamlessly into a scary sci-fi future in this 'visually startling' (Variety) tale. In a world controlled by villains known as the Strangers, John Murdoch awakens suspected in a series of murders. It's up to a mad scientist and a detective to help him elude the Strangers...and find out why he may hold the key to escaping their hellish existence.

featureResponse.title: Dead Man on Campus
featureResponse.shortSummary: College roommates discover an obscure loophole in the school charter that awards straight A's to any student whose roommate kills himself.
featureResponse.summary: This dark comedy stars Tom Everett Scott and Mark-Paul Gosselaar as party-hearty college roommates who are both in danger of flunking out. But when they discover an obscure loophole in the school charter that awards straight A's to any student whose roommate kills himself, the duo set out to find a suicidal new roomie...for a limited time only.

featureResponse.title: Dear God
featureResponse.shortSummary: Small-time con man Greg Kinnear finds his inner good guy working for the U.S. Postal Service in this heartwarming comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A con man finds his inner good guy working for the U.S. Postal Service in this comedy. When a judge gives him the choice of a job or jail, Greg Kinnear lands in the Dead Letter Office, where he and his co-workers deal with mail addressed to Santa, the Tooth Fairy, Elvis and God. On a whim he answers a desperate letter...and finds himself playing L.A.'s fairy godfather.

featureResponse.title: Deep Cover
featureResponse.shortSummary: An upright Los Angeles cop goes undercover to infiltrate a massive drug distribution ring.
featureResponse.summary: Los Angeles police officer Russell Stevens Jr. grew up shunning drugs and street life after he watched his father die in a holdup. But his latest assignment on the force is to immerse himself in that very lifestyle by going undercover and earning the trust of drug lords responsible for one of the largest distribution rings in California.

featureResponse.title: Dennis the Menace
featureResponse.shortSummary: The comic-strip kid creates havoc for his grumpy neighbor in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: One of the comics' favorite mischief-makers hits the big screen! Little Dennis can't seem to leave his house without creating havoc, especially for his grumpy neighbor, Mr. Wilson--who hates kids, but ends up babysitting Dennis when his mom and dad go out of town. With Christopher Lloyd, Joan Plowright, Lea Thompson, Mason Gamble and Walter Matthau as Mr. Wilson.

featureResponse.title: The Devil Wears Prada
featureResponse.shortSummary: Meryl Streep and Anne Hathaway star in this hit film about a college graduate who works for the boss from hell at a fashion magazine.
featureResponse.summary: Recent college graduate Andy Sachs is nonplussed when she lands a job as the assistant of fashion magazine editor Miranda Priestly. Not only is plain-Jane Andy out of her league in the world of couture, but Miranda is extremely demanding. But the job leads her in some surprising new directions--including a makeover, a romance and even a little sympathy for the 'devil.'

featureResponse.title: The Devil's Advocate
featureResponse.shortSummary: Hotshot lawyer Keanu Reeves accepts a deal for endless success from diabolical attorney Al Pacino in this supernatural thriller.
featureResponse.summary: In this supernatural thriller, hotshot New York lawyer Keanu Reeves accepts a deal for endless success from diabolical attorney Al Pacino--but finds that temptation exacts a steep price. The eternal battle between good and evil rages anew, complete with human demons and wild special effects. Charlize Theron, Jeffrey Jones, Judith Ivey and Craig T. Nelson co-star.

featureResponse.title: Dirty War
featureResponse.shortSummary: This thriller takes a hypothetical look at how a terrorist 'dirty bomb' attack might be planned and executed in London.
featureResponse.summary: In a post-9/11 world, how do you prepare for the unthinkable? This alarming HBO Films thriller chronicles the hypothetical story of how a terrorist 'dirty bomb' attack might be planned and executed in London despite the best efforts of law enforcement--and shows how devastating such a strike would be.

featureResponse.title: Divergent
featureResponse.shortSummary: Shailene Woodley stars as a unique teen who poses a threat to the conformist dystopian world in which she lives.
featureResponse.summary: In a dystopian, post-apocalyptic world in which people are grouped within distinct factions based on their character traits, one girl stands apart. Shailene Woodley stars in this first adaptation of Veronica Roth's best-selling book trilogy as the 'divergent' teen whose uniqueness makes her a threat to the conformist society in which she exists.

featureResponse.title: Dolphin Tale
featureResponse.shortSummary: An injured dolphin makes a huge splash in the hearts of a young boy and the team that nurses it back to health in this inspiring story.
featureResponse.summary: An injured dolphin makes a huge splash in the hearts of a young boy and the team that nurses it back to health in this true story. For 11-year-old Sawyer, helping Winter and becoming part of the Haskett family and their struggling aquarium is a dream come true. When they are forced to amputate Winter's tail fin, their hopes of saving the creature lie in a prosthetics expert.

featureResponse.title: Dreamgirls
featureResponse.shortSummary: The dazzling adaptation of the hit Broadway musical about the rise of a 1960s female supergroup and the price that they pay along the way.
featureResponse.summary: The hit Broadway musical comes to the screen in this amazing 2006 film about the rise of a 1960s female supergroup--and the price that they pay along the way. Winner of two Academy Awards(R), the film stars Jamie Foxx as the group's Svengali-like manager, Beyonce Knowles as the group's gorgeous lead and Eddie Murphy as a soul singer who gives the girls their first break.

featureResponse.title: Duma
featureResponse.shortSummary: A boy and his pet cheetah wind up on an amazing adventure after they get lost in the Kalahari desert.
featureResponse.summary: Based on a true story, this family film chronicles the adventure of 12-year-old Xan and his cheetah Duma as they become hopelessly lost in the Kalahari desert without enough food or water to survive. Joined by another lost traveler who seems to have his own agenda, Xan and Duma undertake a journey that includes using their broken-down motorcycle as a wind-powered craft.

featureResponse.title: Dunston Checks In
featureResponse.shortSummary: A clever orangutan steals jewels, scenes and hearts as the sidekick to an ace crook in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A clever orangutan steals jewels, scenes and hearts in this 'first-class, stylish farce' ('Variety'). Dunston is crooked Lord Rutledge's simian sidekick, one of the best jewel thieves in the business. But he's tired of his larcenous life, so when they check into a posh Manhattan hotel, Dunston checks out...and into the company of the hotel manager's young son.

featureResponse.title: Ed
featureResponse.shortSummary: The country goes bananas for a chimp that takes the baseball world by storm in this family comedy.
featureResponse.summary: The country goes bananas for a chimp that takes the baseball world by storm in this family comedy. Jack Cooper (Matt LeBlanc) is a highly touted pitching prospect in the minor leagues whose struggling team needs some new life. Enter Ed: the team's new chimpanzee mascot (and Jack's roommate) whose surprising skills on the diamond are just the inspiration the team needs!

featureResponse.title: Edge of Tomorrow
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Cruise is a soldier who continuously relives the day he was killed fighting alien forces in this futuristic sci-fi thriller.
featureResponse.summary: Imagine 'Groundhog Day' meets 'Aliens' and you'll get this action-packed thrill-ride starring Tom Cruise. Sent to the front line in a war against alien invaders known as Mimics, Cruise is killed--only to relive the same morning over and over again. Under the guidance of a renowned warrior (Emily Blunt), Cruise uses the time loop he's in to sharpen his fighting skills.

featureResponse.title: Einstein and Eddington
featureResponse.shortSummary: The tale of the unlikely partnership between Albert Einstein and British scientist Arthur Eddington during World War I.
featureResponse.summary: Albert Einstein was a free-spirited Jewish renegade from Germany; Arthur Eddington was a conservative English Quaker. But these two very different, but incredibly brilliant scientists would form a long-distance partnership that would change the course of modern science forever as they collaborated to pursue new ideas that flew in the face of centuries-old tenets.

featureResponse.title: Elizabeth I (Part 1)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 1 of 2. HBO Films miniseries that explores the intersection of the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I.
featureResponse.summary: Part 1 of 2. Winner of nine Emmy(R) Awards, including Outstanding Miniseries! Helen Mirren and Jeremy Irons star in this HBO Films miniseries about the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I in the latter half of her 45-year reign. Part 1 follows the tempestuous relationship between Elizabeth and the Earl of Leicester through war, treason, illness and a French suitor.

featureResponse.title: Elizabeth I (Part 2)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Part 2 of 2. HBO Films miniseries that explores the intersection of the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I.
featureResponse.summary: Part 2 of 2. Winner of nine Emmy(R) Awards, including Outstanding Miniseries! Helen Mirren and Jeremy Irons star in this two-part HBO Films miniseries about the public and private lives of Queen Elizabeth I in the latter half of her 45-year reign. In Part 2, an older Elizabeth has a passionate affair with the young, ambitious Earl of Essex (Hugh Dancy), Leicester's stepson.

featureResponse.title: El Callejon (Blind Alley)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young Cuban working in Spain finds herself trapped in a creepy, isolated laundromat with two serial killers.
featureResponse.summary: A young Cuban working in Spain finds herself trapped in a creepy, isolated laundromat with two serial killers. But after hours of being tormented in a sadistic game of cat-and-mouse, she is about to discover something even more terrifying about their identities.

featureResponse.title: El misterio de la felicidad (The Mystery of Happiness)
featureResponse.shortSummary: When a man suddenly disappears without a trace, his wife and his business partner and best friend investigate and discover some surprises.
featureResponse.summary: When a man suddenly disappears without a trace, his wife and his business partner and best friend investigate and discover some surprises about the vanished man, as well as their own relationships.

featureResponse.title: Empire
featureResponse.shortSummary: An ambitious South Bronx heroin dealer gets hung up trying to take his business to the next level in this gripping crime thriller.
featureResponse.summary: An ambitious South Bronx heroin dealer gets hung up trying to take his business to the next level in this gripping crime thriller. John Leguizamo stars as the shrewd inner-city kingpin whose life and livelihood go off the rails thanks to his involvement with a shady investment banker.

featureResponse.title: Endless Love
featureResponse.shortSummary: The beautiful daughter of a wealthy doctor falls madly in love with the hunky son of a mechanic from the wrong side of the tracks.
featureResponse.summary: The privileged, beautiful daughter of a wealthy doctor falls madly in love with the hunky, hot-headed son of a mechanic from the wrong side of the tracks, much to the chagrin of her snobby father.

featureResponse.title: Enough Said
featureResponse.shortSummary: Massage therapist Julia Louis-Dreyfus begins a promising relationship with James Gandolfini, unaware of his connection to a client.
featureResponse.summary: A divorced massage therapist begins a promising relationship, unaware of his connection to a client in this comical look at the perils of mid-life dating. Julia Louis-Dreyfus stars as the witty masseuse who unexpectedly falls for a 'wonderful' James Gandolfini. Catherine Keener and Toni Collette co-star in this 'enjoyably meandering ensemble comedy' (Variety).

featureResponse.title: En El Ombligo del Cielo (In the Middle of Heaven)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young female executive and a middle-aged janitor are trapped together on the roof of an office building over the weekend in Mexico City.
featureResponse.summary: Two people who would seem to have little in common--a young female executive and a middle-aged janitor--form an unlikely bond as they reflect on their lives while trapped together on the roof of an office building over the weekend in Mexico City.

featureResponse.title: Epic
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young girl lands in the middle of a conflict between tiny woodland creatures and their decaying enemies in this animated tale.
featureResponse.summary: Size doesn't matter...unless you are from a race of tiny woodland creatures whose secret existence has just been discovered by a human girl. MK always thought her dad's belief in the Leaf Men was lunacy--until she gets shrunk down to their size and lands in the middle of a conflict between them and their decaying enemies, the Boggans, who want to destroy them.

featureResponse.title: Eragon
featureResponse.shortSummary: A farmboy discovers the egg of a dragon--and with it his destiny to resurrect an ancient line of dragon riders to fight an evil King.
featureResponse.summary: In a mythical world of swords & sorcery, a farmboy discovers the egg of a dragon--and with it his destiny to resurrect an ancient line of dragon riders. But the nefarious King who left the dragon species all but extinct has other plans for young Eragon. With help from a craggy old warrior, Eragon and his fire-breathing pet prepare to do battle against the King's army.

featureResponse.title: Erin Brockovich
featureResponse.shortSummary: Julia Roberts won the Best Actress Oscar(R)-winner for her performance as a sexy, tough-talking law clerk who took on a power company.
featureResponse.summary: Julia Roberts was a slam-dunk as the 2000 Best Actress Oscar(R)-winner for her performance as a sexy, tough-talking law clerk who took on a California power company. Backed by the tiny law firm she works for, Roberts uses her charm and pluck to dig up the dirt on the devious corporation that has been poisoning local groundwater for years. With Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.

featureResponse.title: Escape Plan
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sylvester Stallone plots to escape from a maximum-security CIA black-site prison with help from inmate Arnold Schwarzenegger.
featureResponse.summary: Stallone...Schwarzenegger...Stupendous! Sylvester Stallone is a professional security expert who specializes in being implanted in and then escaping from prisons to expose their vulnerability. Double-crossed and left to rot in an impenetrable C.I.A. black site facility, Stallone joins forces with inmate Arnold Schwarzenegger to plot the ultimate escape.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
featureResponse.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
featureResponse.shortSummary: A man undergoes a procedure to have his memories of his ex-girlfriend erased, only to regret his decision in the midst of the operation.
featureResponse.summary: What would you do if you discovered that bad memories could be erased? What would you do if you realized too late that you really didn't want to lose them? Jim Carrey delivers a startling performance in this sharply written mind-bender about a man who finds himself in a desperate race to preserve his recollections of a past love--even as they are disappearing forever.

featureResponse.title: Everyone's Hero
featureResponse.shortSummary: A fired Yankee Stadium worker's son goes in search of Babe Ruth's stolen bat in this Depression-era animated tale.
featureResponse.summary: Yankee Irving can't hit a ball to save his life, but his luck only gets worse when his pop gets canned from working at the Stadium. Can young Yankee find Babe Ruth's stolen bat and save his dad's livelihood and reputation? Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of Major League Baseball Properties, Inc.

featureResponse.title: Fair Game
featureResponse.shortSummary: Miami cop William Baldwin and leggy lawyer Cindy Crawford try to stay one step ahead of a renegade ex-KGB agent who wants her dead.
featureResponse.summary: In this action thriller, Miami cop William Baldwin and leggy lawyer Cindy Crawford try to stay one step ahead of a renegade ex-KGB agent who has targeted her for death. Together, they get out of jams that would stump James Bond, dodging bad guys equipped with high-tech weaponry. The two even manage to make some fireworks of their own!

featureResponse.title: The Family Stone
featureResponse.shortSummary: A culture clash ensues when a New York City career woman heads to New England to spend Christmas with her boyfriend's family.
featureResponse.summary: A tightly wound New York City career woman spends Christmas with her boyfriend and his free-spirited family in this comedy-drama. Everett Stone brings his fiancee Meredith home to meet the wacky, bohemian Stone clan. But neurotic, uptight Meredith's habit of saying and doing the wrong thing leaves the festivities in peril...until her charming sister arrives to save the day.

featureResponse.title: Far From Heaven
featureResponse.shortSummary: The seemingly perfect life of a 1950s housewife is shattered by a shocking secret about her husband and her own forbidden desires.
featureResponse.summary: Julianne Moore gives an Oscar(R)-nominated performance as a 1950s Connecticut housewife whose seemingly perfect life is shattered by a shocking secret about her husband and her own forbidden desires.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Far From Home: Adv. Of Yellow Dog
featureResponse.title: Far From Home: The Adventures of Yellow Dog
featureResponse.shortSummary: A shipwrecked boy and his dog face the Canadian wilderness together in this exciting family adventure.
featureResponse.summary: A shipwrecked boy and his dog face the Canadian wilderness together in this exciting family adventure. Washed ashore after a storm that capsized his father's boat, 14-year-old Angus and his pet head for civilization--a three-week trek over some of the roughest country in North America. Starring Bruce Davison, Mimi Rogers, Jesse Bradford and Tom Bower.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
featureResponse.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
featureResponse.shortSummary: A hot-wired teen learns the ropes of street racing in Japan in this third pulse-pounding entry in the film series.
featureResponse.summary: The rides are hot and the women are hotter as the third pulse-pounding entry in this blockbuster street-racing series burns rubber in exotic Japan. Lucas Black stars as the hot-wired teen who finds proving his mettle on the curvy streets of Tokyo is tougher than expected when a young thug schools him in the art of 'drifting.' Can he learn the ropes in time for the rematch?

featureResponse.title: Fast & Furious 6
featureResponse.shortSummary: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker and company lead the charge to stop an international criminal in this sixth thrilling film in the hit series.
featureResponse.summary: The 'Fast & Furious' crew lead the charge to stop an international criminal in this sixth thrilling installment in the hit series. With the bad guy trying to sell a dirty bomb to the highest bidding terrorist, it's up to Vin Diesel, Paul Walker and company to put the pedal to the metal to stop him, thanks to a deal they cut with federal agent Dwayne Johnson.

featureResponse.title: The Fault in Our Stars
featureResponse.shortSummary: A dying teenage girl unexpectedly falls for a fellow cancer survivor in this moving adaptation of the bestselling novel.
featureResponse.summary: Hazel Grace Lancaster is a beautiful, intelligent 16-year-old girl...and she's dying. From the bestselling novel comes this moving film about Hazel (Shailene Woodley) as her struggle with the notion of death is compromised by her romance with a spirited fellow cancer survivor (Ansel Elgort). 'A sweet, romantic film full of sudden warmth and humor' (Miami Herald).

featureResponse.title: Fellow Traveller
featureResponse.shortSummary: A screenwriter and a matinee film idol are caught up in the McCarthy-era blacklisting witch hunts in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: In the Golden Age of Hollywood, two men had it all: one was a top screenwriter, the other a film idol. But when the witch hunts of McCarthyism swept into Tinseltown, it drove one out of the country and the other to suicide. Ron Silver stars in this stylish drama of one man's determination to take a stand against injustice. Hart Bochner plays his tormented movie-star friend.

featureResponse.title: The Fever
featureResponse.shortSummary: A woman awakens in a war-torn country battling a raging fever and grappling with questions of wealth, guilt and revolution.
featureResponse.summary: Oscar(R)-winner Vanessa Redgrave (Best Supporting Actress for 1977's 'Julia') stars in this intimate tale. Adapted by 'HBO Films' from writer/actor Wallace Shawn's deeply personal stage play, the film focuses on a nameless woman (Redgrave) who awakens in a war-torn, third-world country battling a raging fever and grappling with questions of wealth, guilt and revolution.

featureResponse.title: Fin
featureResponse.shortSummary: Members of a group of old friends who gather for a reunion start to vanish following a mysterious celestial event.
featureResponse.summary: In this apocalyptic thriller, members of a group of old friends who gather for a reunion start to vanish following a mysterious celestial event that knocks out the electricity.

featureResponse.title: Firehouse Dog
featureResponse.shortSummary: A coddled canine puts the spark back into a dispirited fire station in this family film.
featureResponse.summary: A coddled canine puts the spark back into a dispirited fire station in this family film. Famous dog-actor Rexxx lives in luxury...until a botched airplane stunt leaves the pup feared dead. Far from his home and fans, Rexxx waddles into a decaying firehouse where he uses his talents to save lives and light up the lifeless station.

featureResponse.title: Firewall
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bank robbery gets a futuristic facelift in this high-tech thriller starring Harrison Ford.
featureResponse.summary: Bank robbery gets a futuristic facelift in this high-tech thriller. Harrison Ford stars as Jack Stanfield, the head of security for a Seattle bank who is forced by a devious criminal to facilitate a tricky multimillion-dollar transfer to an offshore account--while his wife and two kids are held at gunpoint. Can Jack hack through the seemingly impenetrable systems he designed?

featureResponse.title: First Kid
featureResponse.shortSummary: Maverick secret service agent Sinbad is assigned to protect the U.S. president's attention-starved son in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A maverick secret service agent is given the unseemly assignment of protecting the U.S. president's attention-starved son in this touching comedy. Sinbad stars as the boisterous bodyguard who is surprised to find he has a great deal in common with the lonely lad. Brock Pierce, Blake Boyd, Timothy Busfield, Robert Guillaume and Lisa Eichhorn co-star.

featureResponse.title: The First Wives Club
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton star as scorned wives gleefully taking on their exes in a battle of the sexes.
featureResponse.summary: Three of Hollywood's funniest ladies--Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton--are delectable as scorned wives gleefully taking on their exes in a battle of the sexes, '90s-style. Revenge is riotously sweet as the witchy trio sets out to do in the hubbies who done them wrong. A 'highly enjoyable film romp' ('Variety') sparked by three comic divas in their prime.

featureResponse.title: Flags of Our Fathers
featureResponse.shortSummary: Clint Eastwood's World War II saga that chronicles the lives of the Marines who planted the famous flag during the battle for Iwo Jima.
featureResponse.summary: Clint Eastwood's acclaimed World War II saga chronicles the lives of several Marines who fought in the battle for Iwo Jima--and who planted the U.S. flag in a moment that was captured in the famous photograph that inspired the nation. For the three surviving men who planted that famous flag, it was the beginning of a whirlwind of fleeting fame...and tragic remembrance.

featureResponse.title: Flicka
featureResponse.shortSummary: An unruly teen takes the reins of an equally rebellious horse in this updated remake of the beloved horse tale.
featureResponse.summary: What starts as a lousy summer for teenager Katy McLaughlin soon turns inspiring. Home in Wyoming on her family's horse-breeding ranch, Katy faces a hard-working summer after her poor performance in boarding school. But when Katy encounters a rowdy filly that her father considers dangerous and beyond discipline, Katy believes she has what it takes to tame the horse.

featureResponse.title: Flushed Away
featureResponse.shortSummary: A pampered pet mouse gets flushed down into the sewers of London in this hilarious animated adventure.
featureResponse.summary: Flushed down the toilet by a nasty sewer rat, pampered pet mouse Roddy St. James lands in the squalor of London's smelly sewers in this animated adventure. But getting back to his high-society digs proves much tougher than anticipated, thanks to a villainous amphibian named Toad who has it out for young Roddy and pretty rat Rita, who is helping him escape.

featureResponse.title: Foul Play
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bumbling private eye Chevy Chase pratfalls his way through a case in which frantic villains are out to get Goldie Hawn.
featureResponse.summary: Why is a group of frantic villains out to get Goldie Hawn? She doesn't know--and neither does private eye Chevy Chase, who is assigned to figure it out. Dudley Moore, Burgess Meredith, Rachel Roberts and Billy Barty co-star in this lighthearted comedy-mystery.

featureResponse.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Time Travel
featureResponse.shortSummary: Three social misfits are drawn into a wild time-travel adventure via the bathroom of their favorite local pub.
featureResponse.summary: Hanging at a local pub, Ray, Pete and Toby meet a lovely young woman who claims to be a time traveler from the future. As she spins her wild tale, the skeptical Pete stumbles into a time portal--in the pub's toilet--and sets off a wild adventure that results in a comedic crisis of mistaken identities, close calls, romance and anarchy--with the future of mankind at stake.

featureResponse.title: Furious 7: HBO First Look
featureResponse.shortSummary: Behind the scenes of the action-packed seventh installment in the 'Fast & Furious' series. Vin Diesel stars.
featureResponse.summary: Behind the scenes of the action-packed seventh installment in the 'Fast & Furious' series. Vin Diesel stars.

featureResponse.title: Game Change
featureResponse.shortSummary: The 2008 presidential campaign of John McCain and Sarah Palin is seen from the perspective of a beleaguered strategist.
featureResponse.summary: With John McCain trailing in the polls during the 2008 U.S. presidential election, strategist Steve Schmidt knew he needed a 'game changer' to turn the tide. With Sarah Palin, he thought he had found that person. This searing, behind-the-scenes look at McCain's ill-fated campaign follows the daring plan to add Palin to the ticket and the implosion that would soon follow.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
featureResponse.title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
featureResponse.shortSummary: The portly comic-strip feline finds himself living the high life in London thanks to a case of mistaken identity in this riotous sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Crossing the Atlantic with puppy pal Odie, the portly feline plans to hamper his owner's marriage proposal, but soon finds himself mistaken for a missing tabby with a noble inheritance. Garfield's living the high life in London while his counterpart Prince works the streets, but there's one big problem--the evildoer behind the kitty-napping now wants to get rid of Garfield!

featureResponse.title: The General's Daughter
featureResponse.shortSummary: Army investigators probe the brutal murder of a female officer on a military base,
featureResponse.summary: When a female Army officer--and daughter of a respected general--is brutally murdered on a military base, investigators are assigned to solve the case as quickly and quietly as possible. What they find is a kinky, labyrinthine mystery and a slew of suspects with plenty to hide.

featureResponse.title: Getaway
featureResponse.shortSummary: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife.
featureResponse.summary: Washed-up race car driver Brent Magna finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller. Told to commandeer a souped-up Mustang outfitted with surveillance cameras by an anonymous voice on his cell phone, Magna (Ethan Hawke) is ordered to perform a series of dangerous tasks--or his wife will die.

featureResponse.title: Gia
featureResponse.shortSummary: Angelina Jolie stars in the tragic story of Gia Carangi, the supermodel who dominated the international fashion scene of the late '70s.
featureResponse.summary: She was one of the most beautiful and envied women in the world...and one of the loneliest. Angelina Jolie stars in this drama based on the tragic true story of Gia Carangi, the supermodel who dominated the international fashion scene of the late '70s until her drug-fueled lifestyle and unhappiness caught up with her.

featureResponse.title: The Girl
featureResponse.shortSummary: Iconic director Alfred Hitchcock's obsessive relationship with actress Tippi Hedren is the focus of this HBO Films drama.
featureResponse.summary: He was the Master of Suspense, a director whose films thrilled, terrified and wowed. But to Tippi Hedren, the true terror of Alfred Hitchcock came from the director himself. Mirroring Hitchcock's own movies, this tale of obsession chronicles the director's grooming of Hedren into a star--and his growing obsession with her personally--as they filmed 'The Birds' and 'Marnie.'

featureResponse.title: Girl, Interrupted
featureResponse.shortSummary: Troubled teen Winona Ryder is committed to an institution where she meets an eclectic batch of characters.
featureResponse.summary: Susanna, a teenager growing up in the late 1960s, doesn't know where she belongs. She's too crazy for her parents' refinement, and she's too sane for Claymoore, the mental institution to which she is committed. Strangely, she starts to feel at home at Claymoore, whose disturbed inhabitants include a charismatic sociopath, a bulimic daddy's girl and a self-willed burn victim.

promotionResponse.title: Godzilla: Sneak Peek
promotionResponse.shortSummary: A quick look at the film 'Godzilla.'
promotionResponse.summary: A quick look at the film 'Godzilla.'

featureResponse.shortTitle: Gold Diggers: Secret of Bear Mountain
featureResponse.title: Gold Diggers: The Secret of Bear Mountain
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two teenage girls set out on a quest to find gold buried in Bear Mountain in this 'delightful' ('The Washington Post') family film.
featureResponse.summary: Could gold be buried in Bear Mountain? Two teenage girls set out on a quest for the truth in this family film. City-raised Beth thought she would loathe her new country home, but when she meets the rugged Jody, she embarks on a riveting adventure. Convinced that treasure awaits, the new pals trade their troubles for an exciting trek into the depths of Bear Mountain.

featureResponse.title: Good Night, and Good Luck
featureResponse.shortSummary: Docudrama chronicling CBS newscaster Edward R. Murrow's historic, on-air takedown of Commie-baiting Senator Joseph McCarthy in 1954.
featureResponse.summary: George Clooney directed, co-wrote and co-stars in this docudrama chronicling CBS newscaster Edward R. Murrow's historic, on-air takedown of Commie-baiting Senator Joseph McCarthy in 1954.

featureResponse.title: A Good Year
featureResponse.shortSummary: Russell Crowe stars as a bond trader whose life is changed by a trip to Provence to dispose of his uncle's estate.
featureResponse.summary: Max Skinner is a hard-charging bond trader preoccupied with money and power. But when his Uncle Henry dies, Max has to leave his life in London behind and journey to Provence to dispose of his uncle's house and vineyards. The glorious setting proves more enticing than Max expected--and the local food and wine are almost as seductive as Fanny, a love-scarred local beauty.

featureResponse.title: Grandma's Boy
featureResponse.shortSummary: A 35-year-old video-game tester is forced to move in with his grandmother and her two silver-haired pals in this bawdy comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A 35-year-old video-game tester is forced to move in with his grandmother and her two pals in this bawdy comedy. Allen Covert stars as the slacker whose status as a ladies' man at his company is debatable--especially after an incident involving a Lara Croft doll. But things really go haywire when rent troubles send him to live with a demented version of 'The Golden Girls'!

featureResponse.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
featureResponse.shortSummary: Quirky chronicle of the misadventures of the concierge (Ralph Fiennes) at a famous European hotel between the first and second World Wars.
featureResponse.summary: From writer-director Wes Anderson ("Moonrise Kingdom") comes this "exquisitely calibrated, deadpan-comic miniature" (New York Magazine) chronicling the misadventures of the concierge (Ralph Fiennes) at a famous European hotel between the first and second World Wars.

featureResponse.title: Gravity
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sandra Bullock is riveting as an astronaut left adrift in space in the wake of a disaster in this Oscar(R)-winning epic.
featureResponse.summary: Winner of 7 Academy Awards, including Best Director (Alfonso Cuaron)! When debris from a destroyed satellite riddles the space shuttle, astronaut Sandra Bullock and space-walking partner George Clooney find themselves drifting alone in space...with their hopes for survival fading with every breath. A 'white-knuckle space odyssey' (Variety).

featureResponse.title: The Great Gatsby
featureResponse.shortSummary: Leonardo DiCaprio brings 'Gatsby' to new life in this stylish, colorful adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's literary classic.
featureResponse.summary: Leonardo DiCaprio brings 'Gatsby' to new life in this stylish, colorful adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's literary classic. Set in a decadent Long Island of the Roaring '20s, the film injects a stunning visual electricity to Fitzgerald's tale that follows various residents of a small town as seen by a bond salesman who rents a house next door to mysterious tycoon Jay Gatsby.

featureResponse.title: Greedy
featureResponse.shortSummary: Green-eyed relatives track down a well-liked nephew in a ploy to keep their uncle's moneybags in family hands in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Green-eyed relatives track down a well-liked nephew in a ploy to keep their uncle's money in family hands in this comedy. Kirk Douglas is the wealthy Uncle Joe whose family members seek a piece of his deep pockets after his death. But with Joe's cute caretaker in the picture, they have one last hope to keep the cash with his kin--the long-lost Danny (Michael J. Fox).

featureResponse.title: Grey Gardens
featureResponse.shortSummary: The lives of two eccentric, mutually dependent women play out in a decaying house known as Grey Gardens.
featureResponse.summary: They were once steeped in affluence, enjoying a luxurious lifestyle in East Hampton while they defied convention amidst the social royalty. Based on the women who inspired the Maysles brothers' 1975 documentary, this film tells the story of 'Big Edie' and 'Little Edie' Bouvier Beale, whose eccentric, mutually dependent lives played out in a decaying house known as Grey Gardens.

featureResponse.title: Grudge Match
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bitter former boxing rivals Robert De Niro and Sylvester Stallone step into the ring as senior citizens to settle a 30-year-old score.
featureResponse.summary: Think 'Rocky' vs. 'Raging Bull' and you'll get an idea of what to expect from this funny comedy starring Robert De Niro and Sylvester Stallone as bitter former boxing rivals who enter the ring as senior citizens to settle a 30-year-old score. With 'Grudgement Day' fast approaching, the pair must train like never before...while deflecting old-age cracks every step of the way.

featureResponse.title: The Guru
featureResponse.shortSummary: An Indian man comes to NYC where he uses the advice of a porn actress to find his calling as a sex guru to the wealthy.
featureResponse.summary: An Indian dance teacher comes to America where he uses the advice of a porn actress to find his calling as a sex guru to New York City's wealthy and famous. Heather Graham, Marisa Tomei and Jim Mistry star in this outrageous comedy.

featureResponse.title: Hanging Up
featureResponse.shortSummary: The conflicts among three sisters and their crotchety drunk of a father unfold in this witty comedy-drama.
featureResponse.summary: In the busy lives of three sisters, their aging father is a burden that has not been shared equally. Eve has taken most of the responsibility, while the other two are too involved in their own lives to help the crotchety drunk. The conflicts among the girls unfold through a tangle of phone calls, family gatherings and flashbacks in this witty tale.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
featureResponse.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
featureResponse.shortSummary: The fourth 'Harry Potter' film takes the young wizard into his most dangerous territory yet as he finally encounters evil Lord Voldemort.
featureResponse.summary: The fourth installment in the Harry Potter series takes the young wizard into his most dangerous territory yet as Lord Voldemort--the villain who killed Harry's parents--regains his powers. (C) 2005 Warner Bros. Harry Potter Publishing Rights (C) J.K. Rowling. HARRY POTTER, characters, names and related indicia are trademarks of and (C) Warner Bros. All rights reserved.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 01: The Walk
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Mexican man and his son are faced with a major crisis of conscience as they try to cross the border illegally.
featureResponse.summary: A Mexican man and his son are faced with a major crisis of conscience as they try to cross the border illegally.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 02: Emergency Contact
featureResponse.shortSummary: An inexperienced emergency-room nurse becomes the voice of reason to a woman having a breakdown.
featureResponse.summary: An inexperienced emergency-room nurse becomes the voice of reason to a woman having a breakdown.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 03: Progress
featureResponse.shortSummary: The last black man on Earth stays in isolation until his existence is discovered by a white woman with a reason to find him.
featureResponse.summary: The last black man on Earth stays in isolation until his existence is discovered by a white woman with a reason to find him.

featureResponse.title: HBO Access 04: The Last Song
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Korean woman working at a karaoke bar bonds with a mysterious stranger who refuses to leave at closing time.
featureResponse.summary: A Korean woman working at a karaoke bar bonds with a mysterious stranger who refuses to leave at closing time.

featureResponse.title: Head Above Water
featureResponse.shortSummary: Holiday plans for a respected judge and his young wife go awry when her ex-lover turns up dead in her bed in this dark comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A corpse that won't keep still makes for lively doings--and a lot of suspense--in this twisty black comedy.
