Holiday plans for a respected judge and his young wife go shockingly awry when the lady's ex-lover turns up dead in her bed. The trouble is, the body won't stay put--and neither will the murderer.

featureResponse.title: Head Over Heels
featureResponse.shortSummary: A recently dumped woman falls for her dreamy new neighbor--until she starts spying on him and thinks he may actually be a murderer!
featureResponse.summary: A recently dumped art restorer thinks she has finally found true love with her new neighbor--a dreamy fashion executive--until she starts spying on him and thinks he may actually be a murderer! Monica Potter and Freddie Prinze Jr. star.

featureResponse.title: The Heat
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sandra Bullock is a straight-laced FBI agent who is forced to partner with foul-mouthed Boston cop Melissa McCarthy in this raucous comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Sandra Bullock is a straight-laced FBI agent who is forced to partner with foul-mouthed Boston cop Melissa McCarthy in this raucous comedy hit. With only the mutual mission of putting away a sadistic drug dealer connecting them, this pair of opposites attract nothing but gut-busting laughs in this riotous film that turns the 'buddy cop' genre on its ear.

featureResponse.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
featureResponse.shortSummary: The powerful story of the war-torn romance between literary giant Ernest Hemingway and trailblazing war correspondent Martha Gellhorn.
featureResponse.summary: It was a romance born out of war...and later torn apart by it. This powerful HBO Films drama recounts the relationship between literary giant Ernest Hemingway and trailblazing war correspondent Martha Gellhorn. Nicole Kidman and Clive Owen star as the two writers whose passionate romance played out against such epic backdrops as the Spanish Civil War and World War II.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
featureResponse.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bilbo, Gandalf and a motley crew of dwarves continue their quest to battle the evil dragon Smaug in Part II of the 'Hobbit' trilogy.
featureResponse.summary: Bilbo, Gandalf and a motley crew of dwarves continue their quest to retake the dwarf kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug in Part Two of the 'Hobbit' trilogy. Facing danger at every turn from orcs, giant spiders, and even wood elves, the surly bunch make their way to Smaug's lair where untold treasure awaits...if the fire-breathing beast doesn't burn them to a crisp first.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
featureResponse.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
featureResponse.shortSummary: Macaulay Culkin returns as America's funniest kid in distress, this time on his own in the Big Bad Apple.
featureResponse.summary: Kevin's back! Macaulay Culkin returns as America's favorite kid in distress, and this time he's on his own in the Big Bad Apple. Armed with Dad's wallet and credit cards, Kevin's having the time of his life! But uh-oh! Those two inept burglars from back home show up to rob a kindly old toy-store owner of the money he was planning on donating to a children's hospital.

featureResponse.title: Home Alone 3
featureResponse.shortSummary: A precocious eight-year-old boy who is stuck at home with chicken pox teaches a group of bumbling burglars that crime doesn't pay.
featureResponse.summary: Alex Pruitt thought a day alone in his house recovering from chicken pox would be fairly relaxing. Boy, was he ever wrong! Three Stooges-style hilarity ensues when the precocious eight-year-old is forced to teach a group of bumbling burglars that crime doesn't pay. Starring Alex D. Linz and Haviland Morris. Directed by Raja Gosnell; written by John Hughes.

featureResponse.title: Hope Floats
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young woman (Sandra Bullock) moves back to her mother's home with her daughter after being humiliated by her husband on national TV.
featureResponse.summary: For Birdee Pruitt (Sandra Bullock), the search for true love begins when her husband admits his love for another woman to her--on a national TV talk show! A former prom queen with an attitude, the suddenly humbled Birdee takes her daughter and returns to her mother's Texas home, where she learns a few things about herself...and about love.

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part I
featureResponse.shortSummary: Baghdad, 1979. Deputy President Saddam Hussein and his allies take control of Iraq after intimidating the President into resigning.
featureResponse.summary: Baghdad, 1979. Deputy President Saddam and his allies intimidate President Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr into resigning. Convening his first Ba'ath party congress, the new president exposes 'detractors,' who are forced to confess to an attempted coup and executed by party members in a test of loyalty. The personality of Saddam soon permeates Iraq.

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part II
featureResponse.shortSummary: 1988. Baghdad is jubilant in victory after the war with Iran, but Kuwait's upsurge in oil output prompts Saddam's wrath.
featureResponse.summary: 1988. Though Iraq is on the brink of bankruptcy, Baghdad is jubilant in victory after the war with Iran. Uday celebrates in a nightclub by getting drunk and firing a gun into the crowd. As Kuwait's upsurge in oil output challenges Iraqi prosperity, a family lunch reveals fractures in Saddam's household. Later, Saddam leads his army into 'the mother of all battles.'

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part III
featureResponse.shortSummary: May 1995. Iraq is crippled by UN sanctions for refusing to comply with weapons inspections.
featureResponse.summary: May 1995. Iraq is crippled by UN sanctions for refusing to comply with weapons inspections. When inspectors are finally admitted, a cat-and-mouse game begins. In charge of the subterfuge is Qusay, Saddam's new successor--a move that infuriates Hussein Kamal. Later, Hussein and his brother cross the border to take diplomatic asylum in Jordan.

featureResponse.title: House of Saddam - Part IV
featureResponse.shortSummary: March 2003. As U.S. forces seize control of Iraq, Saddam instructs most of his family to flee and prepares to hide himself.
featureResponse.summary: March 2003. As Bush declares "the day of liberation is near," Saddam instructs most of his family to flee to Syria; only Uday, Qusay and grandson Mustapha remain. As coalition forces flood Baghdad, Saddam remains holed up in a hut. Uday, Qusay and Mustapha hide in a relative's house, but the location leaks to U.S. officials. Later, Saddam senses the net closing in on him

featureResponse.shortTitle: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
featureResponse.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
featureResponse.shortSummary: It's passion in paradise when a high-powered stockbroker and single mom meets a handsome--and much younger--man while on vacation.
featureResponse.summary: Forty-year-old Stella, a high-powered stockbroker and single mom, needs a vacation. Dragged to an island paradise by a friend (Whoopi Goldberg), Stella is wooed by a strikingly handsome aspiring doctor--who happens to be twenty years younger. With nothing in common--except the disapproval of their families--the two try to transport their dreamy romance into the real world.

featureResponse.title: Hulk
featureResponse.shortSummary: Marvel Comics' mean green superhero is brought to life by Oscar(R)-winning director Ang Lee in this thrilling and thoughtful origins story.
featureResponse.summary: Marvel Comics' mean green superhero is brought to life by Oscar(R)-winning director Ang Lee in this thrilling origins story. Eric Bana stars as Dr. Bruce Banner, a scientist who transforms into the rage-filled Hulk whenever he's under duress. Co-starring Jennifer Connelly as Banner's devoted partner and Sam Elliott as her cold-blooded General-father who wants the Hulk dead.

featureResponse.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
featureResponse.shortSummary: Manny the Mammoth, Diego the saber-toothed tiger, Sid the Sloth and Scrat the Squirrel face global warming in this animated sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Animated ice-age creatures Manny the Mammoth, Diego the saber-toothed tiger, Sid the Sloth and frustrated acorn-chaser Scrat the Squirrel face their biggest challenge yet: global warming. With their glacier habitat turning into a water world, the animals set a course towards potential salvation--an ark of sorts that lies at the other end of the valley.

featureResponse.title: Inspector Gadget
featureResponse.shortSummary: A nerdy security guard is transformed into a high-tech crime-fighting machine in order to defeat the nefarious Dr. Claw.
featureResponse.summary: Matthew Broderick stars as the greatest hero ever assembled in this family comedy based on the 1980s animated TV series. Broderick plays a nerdy security guard who is transformed into a high-tech crime-fighting machine in order to defeat the nefarious Dr. Claw.

featureResponse.title: Insurgent: HBO First Look
featureResponse.shortSummary: An inside look at the thrilling sequel to 'Divergent.' Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort star.
featureResponse.summary: An inside look at the thrilling sequel to 'Divergent.' Shailene Woodley and Ansel Elgort star.

featureResponse.title: The Internship
featureResponse.shortSummary: Vince Vaughn and Owen Wilson reteam as a pair of old-school salesmen who enter the internship program at Google.
featureResponse.summary: Call them 'Google Crashers'! 'Wedding Crashers' co-stars Vince Vaughn and Owen Wilson reteam as a pair of downsized watch salesmen who enter the internship program at Google. Hoping to land permanent positions with the search engine giant, the duo injects their old-school tactics and ideals into a youth-infused environment. The result: big-time laughs with a lot of heart.

featureResponse.title: The Interpreter
featureResponse.shortSummary: A United Nations interpreter winds up in the midst of an assassination plot in this gripping thriller.
featureResponse.summary: A United Nations interpreter winds up in the midst of an assassination plot in this gripping thriller. Silvia, an interpreter from South Africa, overhears a death threat against her homeland's dictator, who is about to address the U.N. assembly. In investigating the plot, a Secret Service agent must rely on Silvia, whose mysterious past is linked to the explosive present.

featureResponse.title: Into the Storm
featureResponse.shortSummary: This follow-up to 'The Gathering Storm' follows Winston Churchill from 1940 to 1945 as he led his beleaguered nation through World War II.
featureResponse.summary: For five years, Winston Churchill played a huge role in thwarting the Nazis during World War II, his intrepid leadership inspiring millions. This powerful follow-up to HBO's Emmy(R)-winning 'The Gathering Storm' follows Churchill from 1940 to 1945 as he guided his beleaguered nation through the crucible of the war years--even as his marriage was encountering its own struggles.

featureResponse.title: Into the Storm
featureResponse.shortSummary: A small mid-western town is besieged by a devastating series of tornadoes in this thrilling disaster epic.
featureResponse.summary: A small mid-western town is besieged by a devastating series of tornadoes in this thrilling disaster epic that is jam-packed with first-rate special effects. As the residents of Silverton, including a vice principal and his sons, run for their lives, die-hard storm chasers and daredevils alike steer their way directly into the deadly path of these mega-twisters.

featureResponse.title: In the Land of Women
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young screenwriter gets emotionally involved with a mother and her older daughter in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: Trying to regain direction, Carter Webb, a wannabe screenwriter lured into writing porn films, leaves L.A. for the serenity of Michigan. His ailing grandmother lives there, but it's her neighbors with whom Carter becomes intrigued. Soon after he meets the neurotic Sarah and her oldest daughter, the beautiful Lucy, Carter becomes caught up in their quirky problematic lives.

featureResponse.shortTitle: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
featureResponse.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
featureResponse.shortSummary: A who's who of comic talent cuts loose in Stanley Kramer's 1963 comedy epic about a rowdy scramble for hidden treasure.
featureResponse.summary: Here's one of the great, great, great, great comedies of all time! A who's who of comic talent cuts loose in Stanley Kramer's 1963 comedy epic about a rowdy scramble for hidden treasure. Spencer Tracy heads up the incredible cast that includes Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Buddy Hackett, Ethel Merman, Mickey Rooney, Dick Shawn, Phil Silvers, Terry Thomas and Jonathan Winters.

featureResponse.title: Jacob's Ladder
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Vietnam vet plagued by nightmarish memories of the war starts to experience horrifying hallucinations and loses his grip on sanity.
featureResponse.summary: Tim Robbins stars in this eerie psychological mystery about a Vietnam vet who is plagued by nightmarish memories of the war while grieving over the death of his young son. As he starts to experience horrifying hallucinations, the line between fantasy and reality becomes blurred, leading to a mind-bending final twist.

featureResponse.title: Jakob the Liar
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Jewish man provides a ray of hope to his neighbors--via imaginary radio transmissions--amidst Nazi persecution.
featureResponse.summary: A Jewish man provides hope to his neighbors--via imaginary radio transmissions--amidst Nazi persecution. Jakob, a man sequestered in the Jewish ghetto of Lodz, Poland, is suspected by his neighbors of having a secret radio. Sensing an opportunity, Jakob makes up fake broadcasts that provide a ray of hope in dramatic contrast with the horror and danger around him.

featureResponse.title: Jersey Boys
featureResponse.shortSummary: Clint Eastwood's winning adaptation of the hit Broadway musical that details the story of music legends Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons.
featureResponse.summary: From the Tony(R)-winning Broadway musical comes this winning film from director Clint Eastwood that chronicles the story of 1960s music legends Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons. Starting from their New Jersey beginnings walking a fine line between show biz and organized crime, the film details their stunning rise to fame on the back of Valli's one-of-a-kind voice.

featureResponse.title: JFK
featureResponse.shortSummary: Oliver Stone's controversial hit with Kevin Costner as the D.A. who tried to uncover the truth behind John F. Kennedy's assassination.
featureResponse.summary: Oliver Stone's controversial blockbuster about the 1963 assassination of President John F. Kennedy and its aftermath. Kevin Costner stars as New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison, who refused to accept the Warren Commission's official findings and set out to prove that JFK was the victim of a vast conspiracy.

featureResponse.title: Jingle All the Way
featureResponse.shortSummary: Christmas Eve finds Arnold Schwarzenegger desperately in search of a hard-to-find toy for his son in this holiday comedy.
featureResponse.summary: It's a merry change of pace for everyone's favorite muscleman as Arnold Schwarzenegger goes Christmas shopping! Dashing through the mall on a hectic yuletide eve, Arnold's a frazzled dad out to get his son the hottest toy on the market--no matter how many irate moms, ornery Santas or toy counters he crashes into.

featureResponse.title: Joe's Palace
featureResponse.shortSummary: An empty London mansion casts a spell over an innocent young boy in this thought-provoking psychological drama.
featureResponse.summary: Young Joe takes a job as concierge for enigmatic billionaire Elliot Graham. His assignment: record the visitors at Graham's abandoned mansion across the street. While Joe befriends a pair of illicit lovers who use the home for their trysts, a young woman hired by Graham exposes a stunning family secret--and it's up to Joe to prevent the revelation from destroying Graham.

featureResponse.title: Kingdom Come
featureResponse.shortSummary: A patriarch's funeral brings together a houseful of contentious relatives in this amusing ensemble comedy.
featureResponse.summary: A patriarch's funeral brings together a houseful of contentious relatives in this comedy. Widow Whoopi Goldberg wants to tell the truth about her mean husband--on his tombstone! His older son (LL Cool J) wants to understand his father. His younger son only wants peace from his shrewish wife. And the minister wants a respite from his indigestion. Can this family come together?

featureResponse.title: Kissing a Fool
featureResponse.shortSummary: A groom-to-be and his best friend fall for the same lovely lady in this romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: It's a riotous race to the altar for a groom-to-be and his best friend who fall for the same lovely lady in this romantic comedy. David Schwimmer plays the flirty sportswriter who fears a future with only one woman. In order to gauge her level of loyalty, he enlists best bud Jason Lee to make a play for the future Mrs.--a plan that leads to romantic complications.

featureResponse.title: Kiss of Death
featureResponse.shortSummary: A petty thief is squeezed between the law and the Mob when he's forced to squeal to protect his family in this 1995 film noir remake.
featureResponse.summary: David Caruso stars in this 'sleek, muscular thriller' ('New York Times') as a petty thief squeezed between the law and the Mob. He squeals to protect his family--and earns the enmity of mad-dog chop-shop boss Nicolas Cage ('Matchstick Men').

featureResponse.title: Krush Groove
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jump into the New York City rap scene with this high-energy music hit featuring some of the hottest Top l0 talents of the 1980s.
featureResponse.summary: Jump into the New York City rap scene with this high-energy music hit featuring some of the hottest Top l0 talents of the 1980s. Pop stars Sheila E., Run-DMC, The Fat Boys and Kurtis Blow rock and rap away. Krush Groove is a hip young record company struggling for success--but will a rival firm and a tough loan shark squeeze them out?

featureResponse.title: The Laramie Project
featureResponse.shortSummary: A groundbreaking drama that recreates the efforts of a NYC theater troupe who traveled to the scene of a gay man's brutal murder.
featureResponse.summary: What happens to an American town when a terrible crime rips it apart and thrusts it into the national spotlight? That is the question that led a New York City theatre troupe to the town of Laramie, Wyoming, to seek out residents whose lives were changed after a gay college student named Matthew Shepard was brutally beaten, tied to a fence and left for dead off a rural road.

featureResponse.title: Larry Crowne
featureResponse.shortSummary: Tom Hanks and Julia Roberts star in this tale of an amiable everyman who loses his job, but finds new life in college.
featureResponse.summary: Larry Crowne lost his job--but found himself in the process. Tom Hanks and Julia Roberts star in this uplifting comedy about this amiable everyman whose downsizing turns out to be the best thing that could happen to him. Enrolling in college, Larry discovers new friendships...new styles...and an unexpected attraction to a cynical speech professor (Roberts).

featureResponse.title: The Last King of Scotland
featureResponse.shortSummary: Forest Whitaker delivers an overpowering, Oscar(R)-winning performance as Ugandan dictator Idi Amin in this drama.
featureResponse.summary: Forest Whitaker delivers an overpowering, Oscar(R)-winning performance as Ugandan dictator Idi Amin in this drama. James McAvoy is the young man who becomes Amin's personal physician and closest confidante, enjoying the many perks of the job even as the ruler shows an increasingly evil side. Whitaker is sensational, capturing the dictator's magnetism, charm and dark side.

featureResponse.title: The Last Kiss
featureResponse.shortSummary: An immature guy faces an unexpected crisis when his girlfriend gets pregnant--just as a sexy college girl starts pursuing him!
featureResponse.summary: An immature man nearing the age of 30 faces an unexpected crisis when his girlfriend gets pregnant--just as a sexy college girl starts pursuing him! At the same time, his friends and his parents are experiencing problems of their own in this 'unusually perceptive' ('Hollywood Reporter') comedy-drama. Zach Braff plays the confused father-to-be.

featureResponse.title: Las Analfabetas (The Illiterate)
featureResponse.shortSummary: The relationship between an illiterate, middle-aged woman and the young teacher helping her learn how to read.
featureResponse.summary: Adaptation of Pablo Paredes' play that charts the relationship between an illiterate, middle-aged woman and the young teacher helping her learn how to read.

featureResponse.title: The Late Shift
featureResponse.shortSummary: David Letterman and Jay Leno battle for Johnny Carson's vacant job in this compelling story of the late-night talk-show wars.
featureResponse.summary: In 1990, Johnny Carson announced he was retiring...and all hell broke loose. While NBC schemed, CBS dreamed, and the question on everyone's lips was 'Who will get Johnny's job?' Jay Leno thought he deserved it, David Letterman knew he had earned it, and everybody else wanted a piece of the action. Kathy Bates won a Golden Globe(R) for her performance.

featureResponse.title: La gran familia espanola (Family United)
featureResponse.shortSummary: Five brothers reunite for a wedding at the family estate on the day that Spain plays in the 2010 World Cup final in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Five brothers reunite for a wedding at the family estate on the day that Spain plays in the 2010 World Cup final in this comedy.

featureResponse.title: La mujer de mi hermano
featureResponse.shortSummary: Stuck in a stale marriage, an unfulfilled young woman begins a steamy affair with her husband's younger brother.
featureResponse.summary: Stuck in a stale marriage, a beautiful, sexually unfulfilled young woman begins a steamy affair with her vain husband's free-spirited younger brother.

featureResponse.title: La pelea de mi vida (The Fight of My Life)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A disgraced Argentinean boxer returns home to restore his honor and reunite with the young son he has never met.
featureResponse.summary: Years after being disqualified in a big fight and leaving the country in disgrace, an Argentinean boxer returns to restore his honor and reunite with the young son he has never met.

featureResponse.title: Lean on Me
featureResponse.shortSummary: An inspiring true story with Morgan Freeman as a controversial educator who battles to eliminate crime and drugs from his high school.
featureResponse.summary: The inspiring true story of one man's battle to eliminate crime and drugs in his high school. Morgan Freeman stars as Joe Clark, the tough, controversial educator who used baseball bats and bullhorns to single-handedly clean up his deteriorating New Jersey school.

featureResponse.title: Leave It to Beaver
featureResponse.shortSummary: Beaver Cleaver and his all-American family are back in this 1997 film adaptation of the classic TV series.
featureResponse.summary: Beaver Cleaver and his all-American family are back in this 1997 film adaptation of the classic TV series. Life in the Ohio suburb of Mayfield is idyllic for the Cleavers--dad Ward, mom June, big brother Wally and eight-year-old Theodore a.k.a. "The Beaver". While Beaver tries out for the football team as part of a scheme to get a new bike, Wally begins to discover young love.

featureResponse.title: Legally Blondes
featureResponse.shortSummary: The perky British cousins to Elle Woods bring a similarly smashing sense of style and attitude to an L.A. prep school.
featureResponse.summary: The perky British cousins to Elle Woods of the original 'Legally Blonde' bring a similarly smashing sense of style and attitude to an L.A. prep school in this third film in the series.

featureResponse.title: The Legend of Hercules
featureResponse.shortSummary: The mythical Greek hero is exiled by his cruel stepfather and must use his extraordinary strength to fight his way back to his kingdom.
featureResponse.summary: Kellan Lutz is a beefcake demigod in this muscle-bound origin story about the mythical Greek hero. After learning that he is the son of Zeus, Hercules is betrayed and exiled by his cruel stepfather, the king, and must use his extraordinary strength to fight his way back to his kingdom.

featureResponse.title: The Lego Movie
featureResponse.shortSummary: A plain Lego figure leads a screwball quest to save his city from its evil ruler in this blockbuster animated hit.
featureResponse.summary: 'Everything is Awesome' about this hilarious animated tale that was one of the biggest box office hits of 2014! Emmet (voice of Chris Pratt) is a plain old Lego figure who is content to build straight from the manuals...until he finds the 'Piece of Resistance.' Marked as a savior who will save the city from its evil ruler, Emmet leads a screwball team on the ultimate quest.

promotionResponse.title: Let's Be Cops: Sneak Peek
promotionResponse.shortSummary: A quick look at the film 'Let's Be Cops.'
promotionResponse.summary: A quick look at the film 'Let's Be Cops.'

featureResponse.title: Life Support
featureResponse.shortSummary: An HIV-positive woman's work at an AIDS outreach group helps her atone for the past, but winning back her family proves more difficult.
featureResponse.summary: Oscar(R)-nominee Queen Latifah stars as an HIV-positive Brooklyn woman who channels her energy and regret over past drug addiction into working for an AIDS outreach group. Her passion for her job reveals her deep desire for atonement, but her stubbornness threatens to drive her family even further away leading her to learn a poignant lesson about loving...and letting go.

featureResponse.title: Little Miss Sunshine
featureResponse.shortSummary: A dysfunctional family undertakes a 700-mile journey--in a junky VW van--to realize a little girl's dream of being in a beauty pageant.
featureResponse.summary: Described by Roger Ebert as a 'gentle family satire and a classic American road movie,' this 2006 Oscar(R)-winner for Best Original Screenplay and Best Supporting Actor (Alan Arkin) chronicles the mishap-filled 700-mile journey--in a junky VW van--of one dysfunctional family. Their goal: to realize an optimistic little girl's dream of participating in a beauty pageant.

featureResponse.title: A Little Princess
featureResponse.shortSummary: A resourceful girl goes from riches to rags after her father is reported killed in WWI in this film based on the children's classic.
featureResponse.summary: In this 'delicate, imaginative, beautifully mounted' ('New York Daily News') family movie based on the timeless children's classic, a resourceful young girl goes from riches to rags after her father is reported killed in WWI. But her vivid imagination, storytelling talent and supportive friends sustain her faith and hope through all her troubles.

featureResponse.title: A Little Sex
featureResponse.shortSummary: A handsome Casanova tries to cure his womanizing ways by marrying his girlfriend in this 1982 comedy-drama.
featureResponse.summary: A handsome Casanova tries to cure his womanizing ways by marrying his girlfriend. But can this long-time tiger really change his stripes with all the temptation New York City has to offer? Tim Matheson, Kate Capshaw and Edward Herrmann star in this 1982 comedy-drama.

featureResponse.title: Longford
featureResponse.shortSummary: 'HBO Films' drama about Frank Pakenham, the Earl of Longford, and his controversial friendship with notorious child-killer Myra Hindley.
featureResponse.summary: Frank Aungier Pakenham, the 7th Earl of Longford, was one of the most controversial public figures in modern British history, a crusader with a proclivity for championing lost causes. But it was his last cause--an unlikely friendship with reviled child-killer Myra Hindley--that would undermine his political career and, possibly, her 36-year attempt to win her freedom.

featureResponse.title: Losing Isaiah
featureResponse.shortSummary: A social worker who adopted a crack baby four years earlier battles the now-recovered birth mother for custody.
featureResponse.summary: Interracial adoption is the focus of this drama about a black crack baby abandoned by his mother and adopted by a white social worker. Four years later, the baby's birth mother decides she wants him back and hires a lawyer. The argument is that black children belong with black parents. But what about the feelings of the boy, Isaiah, who knows only one mother?

featureResponse.title: Lost in Translation
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bill Murray and Scarlett Johansson are unlikely friends in Tokyo in Sofia Coppola's Oscar(R)-winning drama.
featureResponse.summary: Sofia Coppola's Oscar(R)-winning drama about an unlikely friendship between two Americans in Tokyo. Bill Murray is a fading actor in the city to film a booze commercial; Scarlett Johansson is a Yale grad there with her celebrity husband. With time to kill, the pair strike up a friendship that reveals their mutual distaste with the direction in which their lives are heading.

featureResponse.title: Los Condenados
featureResponse.shortSummary: A woman who returns to her family mansion where her father ran a cancer clinic discovers that the house holds some dark secrets.
featureResponse.summary: A woman (Cristina Rodlo) who returns to her family mansion where her father ran a cancer clinic discovers that the house holds some dark secrets.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Los Lunes al Sol (Mondays in the Sun)
featureResponse.title: Los Lunes al Sol (Mondays in the Sun)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A group of shipbuilders struggle to find work, love and purpose when a shipyard closing leaves them all unemployed.
featureResponse.summary: A group of shipbuilders struggle to find work, love and purpose when a shipyard closing leaves them all unemployed. When the yards lay off their employees in northern Spain, a group of men are forced to spend their days aimlessly looking for new work and drowning their miseries in booze at a local pub, flirting with girls and trying to salvage the shreds of their self-esteem.

featureResponse.title: Love and Basketball
featureResponse.shortSummary: Next-door neighbors fall in love and grow up to become big-time hoop stars, but have to choose between each other and the game.
featureResponse.summary: "Sanaa Lathan and Omar Epps are a dream team" (San Francisco Chronicle) in this critically acclaimed romance about next-door neighbors who fall in love and grow up to become big-time hoop stars. But their love of the sport will force them to choose between each other and the game.

featureResponse.title: Make Your Move
featureResponse.shortSummary: An ex-con falls for a beautiful Korean girl, despite the bitter rivalry between their brothers, who own rival underground dance clubs.
featureResponse.summary: Derek Hough plays an ex-con who falls for a beautiful Korean girl (BoA), despite the bitter rivalry between their brothers, who own rival underground dance clubs in Brooklyn

featureResponse.title: The Man
featureResponse.shortSummary: A bumbling dental salesman pretends to be an important weapons buyer to help a cop in this screwball comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Derrick Vann, a tough cop, plans a major sting to take down a key weapons dealer. Expecting an affluent buyer in town to make a deal, gang members mistake dental-supply salesman Andy Fiddler for their guy. Vann learns Fiddler's true identity, but forces the oddball Fiddler to partner up and play along with the crooks. But can this utterly mismatched duo catch the bad guys?

featureResponse.title: The Manchurian Candidate
featureResponse.shortSummary: Frank Sinatra stars as a former Korean War veteran whose nightmares expose a mind-blowing communist plot.
featureResponse.summary: Frank Sinatra is a former Korean War veteran who begins to have strange nightmares about the time he spent in a POW camp. Following a thread of memory that leads him to fellow prisoner Laurence Harvey, he uncovers a mind-blowing communist plot. Co-starring Janet Leigh and Best Supporting Actress Oscar(R) nominee Angela Lansbury as one of the meanest mothers in movie history.

featureResponse.title: Mandrake Telefilm: Part 1
featureResponse.shortSummary: An intriguing case lands on Mandrake's desk. Just when he thinks he has it solved, some unexpected news changes the course of events.
featureResponse.summary: An intriguing case lands on Mandrake's desk. Just when he thinks he has it solved, some unexpected news changes the course of events.

featureResponse.title: Mandrake Telefilm: Part 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: After the murder of his client, Joao Paulo Birman, Mandrake investigates and uncovers new suspects--and Birman family secrets.
featureResponse.summary: After the murder of his client, Joao Paulo Birman, Mandrake investigates and uncovers new suspects--and Birman family secrets.

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Man Who Knew Too Little
featureResponse.title: The Man Who Knew Too Little
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bill Murray pratfalls right into a thicket of thugs, secret agents and sultry allure in this hilarious spy caper.
featureResponse.summary: Don't tell geeky tourist Bill Murray, but that London spy 'game' he's playing is for real! When Murray takes in some interactive theater on his English holiday, he pratfalls right into a thicket of thugs, secret agents and sultry allure. The dossier says 'screwball fun' in this loopy spoof of Cold War capers. Co-starring Peter Gallagher, Joanne Whalley and Richard Wilson.

featureResponse.title: Mary and Martha
featureResponse.shortSummary: Two very different women forge a bond steeped in tragedy and African culture in this uplifting tale.
featureResponse.summary: Two women forge a unique bond steeped in tragedy in this uplifting, emotional film. Hilary Swank stars as an interior designer who takes her little boy on an extended trip to Africa; Brenda Blethyn is an English housewife whose own son heads to Africa as a volunteer. When malaria strikes, the lives of these two women are changed forever, uniting them on an epic journey.

featureResponse.title: Mateo
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Colombian teenager in danger of being lured into his uncle's criminal lifestyle finds hope for his future in a local theater group.
featureResponse.summary: A Colombian teenager in danger of being lured into his uncle's criminal lifestyle finds hope for his future in a local theater group in this drama. Starring Carlos Hernandez, Miriam 'Pesca' Gutierrez, Samuel Lazcano, Felipe Botero, Leldy Nino and Juan Orozco.

featureResponse.title: Material Girls
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sisters Hilary and Haylie Duff vow to save their late father's cosmetics company from being sold to the competition in this witty comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Sisters Hilary and Haylie Duff vow to save their late father's cosmetics company from being sold to the competition in this witty comedy. Co-starring Anjelica Huston, Lukas Haas and Maria Conchita Alonso as Inez with Brent Spiner.

featureResponse.title: Men of Honor
featureResponse.shortSummary: A black man wages war on the racist standards of the U.S. Navy in the 1950s in this stirring drama.
featureResponse.summary: A young black man singlehandedly wages war on the racist standards of the U.S. Navy in the 1950s. Based on the life of famed Navy diver Carl Brashear, the film stars Cuba Gooding Jr. as the young chef who makes his mark on a superior and gets sent to the Navy Salvage School where he charts a determined course through insults, fights and humiliations to become a diver.

featureResponse.title: Mermaids
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lovelorn mother hauls her two daughters cross-country every time she falls out of a relationship in this heartwarming film.
featureResponse.summary: A lovelorn mother hauls her two daughters cross-country every time she falls out of a relationship in this film. Winona Ryder is Charlotte, the older of the girls whose mother's ill-fated affairs prompt the family to relocate...where the cycle begins again. But Massachusetts holds promise in the form of a kind shoe-selling gentleman...and possibly a first love for Charlotte!

featureResponse.title: Mike Tyson: Undisputed Truth
featureResponse.shortSummary: Former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and legendary filmmaker Spike Lee bring Tyson's one-man hit stage show to HBO in this special.
featureResponse.summary: Former heavyweight champion Mike Tyson and legendary filmmaker Spike Lee bring Tyson's one-man hit stage show to HBO in this exclusive HBO Films presentation. Enjoy a front-row seat as 'Iron Mike' opens up about his troubled youth, landmark boxing career, key influences, controversies, prison, loss, and most recently, his rehabilitation and redemption.

featureResponse.title: The Milagro Beanfield War
featureResponse.shortSummary: Robert Redford's charming, lusty fable about a Chicano handyman who sets off a battle against a big-time land developer.
featureResponse.summary: Director Robert Redford and his delightful cast, including Melanie Griffith, Ruben Blades and Christopher Walken, celebrate the human spirit in this charming, lusty fable of a lone man battling the system. A Chicano handyman irrigates his parched beanfield with water borrowed from a land developer, which leads to a confrontation between townspeople and the builders.

featureResponse.shortTitle: A Million Ways to Die in the West
featureResponse.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
featureResponse.shortSummary: Seth MacFarlane is the most cowardly sheep farmer this side of the Rio Grande in this comical Old West send-up.
featureResponse.summary: Seth MacFarlane is the most cowardly sheep farmer this side of the Rio Grande in this Old West spoof. When avoiding a showdown gets him dumped, McFarlane vows to win back his girl by challenging her new lover to a draw...if he can learn to shoot first. Enter Charlize Theron as the tough-as-nails wife of a dirty gunslinger who teaches him a few things about handling his pistol.

featureResponse.title: Miss Evers' Boys
featureResponse.shortSummary: Emmy(R)-winning story of a 1930s experiment in which the U.S. government withheld treatment from African American syphilis patients.
featureResponse.summary: Winner of the 1997 Emmy(R) for Best TV Movie! In the 1930s, U.S. government doctors began a controversial experiment. They withheld treatment from a group of African-American men infected with syphilis in order to study the fatal course of the disease...and they didn't tell the men what they were doing. Alfre Woodard plays a dedicated nurse caught in the web of official lies.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Mom and Dad Save the World
featureResponse.title: Mom and Dad Save the World
featureResponse.shortSummary: A California couple are kidnapped by a lovestruck intergalactic despot in this riotous interstellar comedy.
featureResponse.summary: In the mood for total silliness on a planet of idiots? Then you couldn't do better than this comedy about a California couple kidnapped by intergalactic despot Jon Lovitz. He's fallen in love with Teri Garr, and unless she marries him, he'll destroy Earth!

featureResponse.title: Monkeybone
featureResponse.shortSummary: Brendan Fraser plays a cartoonist who can't control his monkey creation in this live-action/animated comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Brendan Fraser plays a cartoonist who can't control his monkey creation in this live-action/animated comedy. Monkeybone is the wild-and-crazy simian character that has sent Fraser's career into orbit, but when an accident leaves the artist in a coma, he is plunged into Downtown--a world where Monkeybone exists, along with dozens of other strange creatures.

featureResponse.title: Moonrise Kingdom
featureResponse.shortSummary: Wes Anderson's hilariously ingenious tale about young love, Scouts and a dsyfunctional family on an island in 1965.
featureResponse.summary: From the hilariously demented mind of Wes Anderson ('Rushmore') comes this Oscar(R)-nominated tale set on an island in 1965. On one side is a group of Khaki Scouts at summer camp; on the other is the dysfunctional Bishop family. When clever, but disliked scout Sam Shakusky runs off with the Bishop's brainy daughter Suzy, it sets off a comical search as a huge storm approaches.

featureResponse.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
featureResponse.shortSummary: Robin Williams is hilarious as a divorced actor who disguises himself as a sweet family nanny to get near his children.
featureResponse.summary: Life is a drag--literally!--for a divorced actor whose wife gets full custody of his adored kids. To be near them, Robin Williams dresses up as sweet Mrs. Doubtfire and gets hired as the family nanny! 'Williams is a drag-out hit' ('Hollywood Reporter') as the loving dad in this hit family comedy. Sally Field is his long-suffering wife, and Pierce Brosnan plays her new beau.

featureResponse.title: Muhammad Ali's Greatest Fight
featureResponse.shortSummary: Nine Supreme Court justices spar over the legitimacy of Muhammad Ali's conscientious-objector appeal during the Vietnam War.
featureResponse.summary: He was one of boxing's all-time greats, but Muhammad Ali's biggest challenge took place far from the ring--in the United States Supreme Court, where the justices debated the outcome of his 1971 conscientious-objector appeal during the Vietnam War. Christopher Plummer, Frank Langella and Benjamin Walker star in this riveting HBO Films drama.

featureResponse.title: Musical Chairs
featureResponse.shortSummary: A Latino falls for a beautiful ballroom dance instructor who has a tragic accident and helps train her for a wheelchair dance competition.
featureResponse.summary: A Latino from the Bronx falls for a beautiful ballroom dance instructor from the Upper East Side who has a tragic accident and helps train her for a wheelchair dance competition. Leah Pipes and E.J. Bonilla star..

featureResponse.title: Musica Campesina
featureResponse.shortSummary: After getting dumped by his American girlfriend, a Chilean immigrant gets stranded in Nashville and wanders around the city.
featureResponse.summary: After getting dumped by his American girlfriend, a Chilean immigrant (Pablo Cerda) gets stranded in Nashville and wanders around the city.

featureResponse.title: The Musketeer
featureResponse.shortSummary: D'Artagnan sets out on a spirited quest to reorganize the Musketeers in this sword-wielding adventure inspired by the legendary tale.
featureResponse.summary: Against the backdrop of a brewing war in 1600s France, youthful D'Artagnan sets out on a spirited quest to reorganize the Musketeers in this adventure. Armed with fine fencing talents and a battle-hungry spirit, the swordsmen band together to save their Queen, bring honor to their country--and possibly slay the evildoer responsible for the murder of D'Artagnan's parents.

featureResponse.title: My Summer of Love
featureResponse.shortSummary: A friendship between a mysterious rich girl spending the summer in Yorkshire and a working-class local girl evolves into something more.
featureResponse.summary: A friendship develops between a rich girl spending the summer in Yorkshire and a working-class local girl. Orphan Mona co-owns a pub with her brother Phil, a former con turned born-again Christian. Mona is intrigued when she meets Tamsin, who is staying at her family's home. In contrast with Phil's earnest piety, the girls' relationship builds in reckless intensity.

featureResponse.title: My Zinc Bed
featureResponse.shortSummary: Alcohol addiction and obsession form the core of this searing adaptation of renowned writer David Hare's play.
featureResponse.summary: Alcohol addiction and obsession form the core of this searing adaptation of renowned writer David Hare's play. The three-character piece follows a poet and recovering alcoholic named Paul, the billionaire businessman who befriends and employs him, and the tycoon's alcoholic wife who has chosen her own road to recovery that doesn't involve AA meetings.

featureResponse.title: Nanny McPhee
featureResponse.shortSummary: A British nanny uses her magical powers to tame the badly-behaved Brown children in this family film.
featureResponse.summary: A British nanny uses magical powers to tame the naughty Brown children in this family film. Widower Cedric Brown has 7 children who have tortured 17 nannies. Number 18, Nanny McPhee (Emma Thompson), a warty woman with a mystical walking stick, wastes no time instilling manners into the bratty brood. But with a rich aunt pushing Cedric to remarry, the kids' future is uncertain.

featureResponse.title: Neighbors
featureResponse.shortSummary: Seth Rogen and his wife go to war against their new neighbors: a frat house run by party-hearty Zac Efron.
featureResponse.summary: It's a hilarious case of 'there goes the neighborhood' for a young couple when the wildest fraternity this side of 'Animal House' move in next door. Seth Rogen stars as the young dad whose battle of pranks against party-hearty Delta Psi president Zac Efron and his brothers turns into an epic game of one-upmanship. Rose Byrne, Christopher Mintz-Plasse and Dave Franco co-star.

featureResponse.title: Nine Months
featureResponse.shortSummary: Carefree child shrink Hugh Grant finds himself suddenly facing fatherhood in this romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: San Francisco child psychiatrist Samuel Faulkner has the perfect life--great job, great car, beautiful apartment and an even more beautiful live-in girlfriend. What could go wrong? How about an unplanned baby? Hugh Grant stars in this 'often raucously funny' ('New York Times') romantic comedy as the carefree man suddenly facing fatherhood. Julianne Moore is the mother-to-be.

featureResponse.title: Non-Stop
featureResponse.shortSummary: A flight takes a terrifying turn for air marshal Liam Neeson when a maniac threatens to kill someone every 20 minutes if he isn't paid.
featureResponse.summary: A non-stop flight takes a terrifying turn for federal air marshal Liam Neeson: an anonymous text from a maniac promises a passenger death every 20 minutes if $150 million isn't transferred into a bank account. Once the bodies begin piling up, it's thrusters at full speed as Neeson desperately tries to identify the killer...while also proving it's not him! With Julianne Moore.

featureResponse.title: The Normal Heart
featureResponse.shortSummary: The early days of the HIV-AIDS crisis in 1980s New York City is the focus of this searing HBO Films drama.
featureResponse.summary: The early days of the HIV-AIDS crisis in 1980s New York City is the focus of this searing HBO Films drama. Adapted from Larry Kramer's Tony(R)-winning play, the film provides an unflinching look at the nation's sexual politics as gay activists and their allies in the medical community fight to expose the truth about the burgeoning epidemic to a city and nation in denial.

featureResponse.title: Now You See Me
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four magicians orchestrate a masterful series of increasingly brazen--and criminal--illusions in this superb sleight-of-hand caper.
featureResponse.summary: Four magicians orchestrate a masterful series of increasingly brazen--and criminal--illusions in this superb sleight-of-hand caper. Doggedly trailed by a determined FBI agent, 'The Four Horseman' and their mysterious leader cast a spell over their delirious fans as they set up each of their amazing theft/tricks that defy logic and explanation.

featureResponse.title: No Way Out
featureResponse.shortSummary: Naval officer Kevin Costner races to prove his innocence in the murder of a party girl with powerful connections.
featureResponse.summary: Shocking suspense snakes through the hairpin turns of this acclaimed political thriller set in Washington, D.C. Kevin Costner stars as an up-and-coming naval officer charged with investigating the murder of a party girl with powerful connections. But the killer's elaborate cover-up scheme has Costner as the prime suspect. 'Tightly wound...ingenious' ('New York Post').

featureResponse.title: A Number
featureResponse.shortSummary: In a world where human cloning is a reality, two genetically identical brothers confront their father in separate, chilling encounters.
featureResponse.summary: In a world where human cloning has become a reality, two genetically identical brothers confront their father as they search for explanations into their past. Tom Wilkinson and Rhys Ifans star in this haunting drama in which the two young men discover they have genetic doubles...and want answers from their father. But will the disturbing truth be more than they can handle?

featureResponse.title: Nuts
featureResponse.shortSummary: Barbra Streisand plays a high-priced call girl who refuses to cop a plea of insanity after murdering one of her clients.
featureResponse.summary: In one of her most challenging roles, Barbra Streisand plays a high-priced call girl who murders one of her clients. Though her parents try to convince her to cop a plea of insanity, she refuses the easy way out. Lawyer Richard Dreyfuss must convince the court of her competence, yet win her freedom.

featureResponse.title: The Object of My Affection
featureResponse.shortSummary: Straight Jennifer Aniston and her gay roommate Paul Rudd find their relationship complicated by her pregnancy in this romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Nina (Jennifer Aniston), a straight woman, and George (Paul Rudd), a gay man, live together happily as best friends until two developments complicate their relationship: Nina's pregnant by her well-meaning boyfriend...and she might be in love with George. The Brooklyn roommates wrestle with love, sex and impending parenthood in this engaging romantic comedy.

featureResponse.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
featureResponse.shortSummary: A man in basic training engages in a battle of wills with the Navy's toughest drill sergeant while fighting his feelings for a local girl.
featureResponse.summary: Zack Mayo wants to make it through basic training. He wants desperately to become an officer and a gentleman. But two things get in the way. He falls in love with spunky Paula and he comes up against the Navy's toughest drill sergeant. A good old-fashioned Hollywood love story that became an enormous box-office hit!

featureResponse.title: One Fine Day
featureResponse.shortSummary: New Yorkers Michelle Pfeiffer and George Clooney meet, fight and fall in love--all in one day--in this breezy romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Two New Yorkers meet, fight and fall in love--all in one day--in this breezy romantic comedy. Michelle Pfeiffer's a workaholic architect with a 5-year-old son. George Clooney's an easygoing newspaper columnist with a young daughter. When circumstances throw them together for a day of child care and career crises, it's hate at first sight...right up until the final clinch!

featureResponse.title: Opportunity Knocks
featureResponse.shortSummary: A swindler finds love and prosperity while fleecing an affluent family in this comedy starring Dana Carvey.
featureResponse.summary: A swindler finds love and prosperity while fleecing an affluent family in this comedy. Dana Carvey is a small-time crook who breaks into a suburban mansion and winds up staying when he realizes the wealthy homeowners are away. But things get complicated when he poses as a business-savvy house sitter and soon finds himself forced to choose between his hoax and love.

featureResponse.title: The Other Woman
featureResponse.shortSummary: Cameron Diaz. Leslie Mann and Kate Upton begin a campaign of revenge against the man who has been cheating on them.
featureResponse.summary: Carly, Kate and Amber all have one thing in common: Kate's cheating husband Mark! Cameron Diaz, Leslie Mann and Kate Upton star as the trio of jilted and very angry females who team up to exact revenge on the philandering cad (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) using any means necessary--including laxatives, hair remover and even estrogen! Don Johnson and Taylor Kinney co-star.

featureResponse.title: Out to Sea
featureResponse.shortSummary: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau team up as phony dance hosts in this shipboard comedy. Dyan Cannon co-stars.
featureResponse.summary: Screenland's favorite grumpy old men Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau are as shipshape as ever in this comedy. When Matthau convinces his brother-in-law Lemmon to join him on a cruise, he forgets to tell him that they've signed on as dance hosts. Dancing and romancing every eligible woman on board, they soon learn that it's never too late to fall in love.

featureResponse.title: Over the Hedge
featureResponse.shortSummary: Forest animals face off against encroaching suburbia in this endearing animated comedy based on the popular comic strip.
featureResponse.summary: Forest animals face off against encroaching suburbia in this animated comedy based on the comic strip. Awakening from hibernation, the creatures discover they have new human neighbors who have separated their lairs with a large hedge. Enter a wily raccoon--who owes a grumpy bear a lot of junk food--to lead his fellow scavengers on a food-finding mission into the subdivision!

featureResponse.title: Pariah
featureResponse.shortSummary: An African-American teen discovers she's a lesbian and struggles to come out to her conservative parents.
featureResponse.summary: A sensitive 17-year-old African-American (Adepero Oduye) discovers she's a lesbian and struggles to come out to her conservative parents.

featureResponse.title: Path to War
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Frankenheimer's powerful look at how President Lyndon Johnson became the symbol for the most unpopular war in U.S. history.
featureResponse.summary: From director John Frankenheimer ('The Manchurian Candidate') comes this powerful drama of soaring ambition and shattered dreams that takes a provocative insider's look at the way our country goes to war--as seen from inside the LBJ White House leading up to and during Vietnam. Michael Gambon stars as the former president.

featureResponse.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
featureResponse.shortSummary: Percy Jackson, the son of Poseidon, returns to find the legendary Golden Fleece in this epic adventure sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Percy Jackson returns to find the legendary Golden Fleece in this epic sequel. Joined by his friends and a cyclops half-brother, the son of Poseidon must find the Fleece before the devious lightning thief Luke...who plans to use it to destroy Olympus by resurrecting the ultra-evil Kronos. 'A fetching mix of whizz-bang CGI and full-blooded classical storytelling' (NPR.org)

featureResponse.title: Phat Girlz
featureResponse.shortSummary: Stand-up and TV star Mo'Nique delivers plus-size laughs in this raucous comedy about an overweight woman living in an underweight world.
featureResponse.summary: Comedy star Mo'Nique delivers plus-size laughs in this raucous comedy about an overweight woman living in an underweight world. As a sassy clerk at a stylish L.A. store, Jazmin yearns for a more fulfilling career. But it's not until a Palm Springs vacation where she meets the perfect man that she realizes that happiness doesn't lie in being able to fit into a size 2 dress.

featureResponse.title: Phil Spector
featureResponse.shortSummary: Al Pacino and Helen Mirren star in this riveting HBO Films drama that follows the murder trial of legendary music producer Phil Spector.
featureResponse.summary: The client-attorney relationship between legendary music producer Phil Spector and defense lawyer Linda Kenney Baden--who represented Spector during his first murder trial--is explored in this HBO Films drama written and directed by David Mamet. Oscar(R) winners Al Pacino and Helen Mirren star in this work of fiction that recounts Spector's first trial in Lana Clarkson's death.

featureResponse.title: The Piano
featureResponse.shortSummary: A passionate love affair ignites between an unhappily married mute woman and the man who bought her cherished piano in this acclaimed film.
featureResponse.summary: A passionate love affair ignites between an unhappily married mute woman and the man who bought her cherished piano in this acclaimed drama. Holly Hunter, Harvey Keitel, Sam Neill star in this 1993 hit. Winner of three Oscars(R), including Best Actress (Hunter), Best Supporting Actress (Paquin), and Best Original Screenplay (Jane Campion). 'Beautiful.' (The New York Times).

featureResponse.title: Pink Cadillac
featureResponse.shortSummary: Clint Eastwood is a bounty hunter tracking a jailbird's bail-jumping wife in this free-wheeling comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Clint Eastwood takes a vacation from his usual tough-guy roles in this freewheeling, pedal-to-the-metal action comedy. As a modern-day bounty hunter, he's after a jailbird's bail-jumping wife (Bernadette Peters) who's on the lam with her baby. But neither Clint nor his quarry knows that the screamin'-pink getaway Caddy is loaded with loot, and the bad guys want it back!

featureResponse.title: The Pink Panther
featureResponse.shortSummary: Peter Sellers is the hilariously ditzy Inspector Clouseau in Blake Edwards' riotous 1964 romp.
featureResponse.summary: Peter Sellers is the hilariously ditzy Inspector Clouseau in Blake Edwards' riotous 1964 romp. While the fumbling Frenchman tracks thief David Niven, Niven swipes a precious gem...and the laughs are priceless.

featureResponse.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
featureResponse.shortSummary: Inspector Clouseau's former boss threatens to destroy the world unless the klutzy detective is eliminated in this 1976 'Panther' film.
featureResponse.summary: In this off-the-wall 1976 'Panther' movie, Inspector Clouseau's former boss escapes from an asylum and threatens to destroy the world unless the klutzy detective is eliminated. So a dozen countries send their best assasins to do just that! Peter Sellers stars.

featureResponse.title: Pinochet's Last Stand
featureResponse.shortSummary: The fascinating story of former Chilean dictator Augusto Pinochet's surprise arrest for crimes against humanity while in London in 1998.
featureResponse.summary: In 1973, General Augusto Pinochet overtook Chile in a violent coup. During his 17-year rule, he suppressed all opposition, and gained a reputation as one of the world's most oppressive dictators. This HBO Films movie based on real-life events tells the fascinating story of Pinochet's surprise arrest for crimes against humanity while in London for back surgery in 1998.

featureResponse.title: The Players Club
featureResponse.shortSummary: A single mother puts herself through college and supports her child by going to work at a strip club.
featureResponse.summary: A single mother puts herself through college and supports her child by going to work at a strip club. Hip-hop star Ice Cube wrote and directed this down and dirty comedy-drama.

featureResponse.title: Por Las Plumas (All About the Feathers)
featureResponse.shortSummary: A lonely security guard finds more than he expected when he buys a rooster in order to get into the cockfighting game.
featureResponse.summary: A lonely security guard in a sleepy Costa Rican town buys a rooster in order to get into the cockfighting game, but gets more than he expected as an odd friendship blooms between the pair.

featureResponse.title: Primo
featureResponse.shortSummary: The atrocities of the Third Reich are witnessed through the vivid, first-person recollections of an Auschwitz survivor.
featureResponse.summary: The atrocities of the Third Reich are witnessed through the vivid, first-person recollections of an Auschwitz survivor. Adapted by Antony Sher from the memoir of Holocaust survivor Primo Levi and featuring Sher in the starring role, the film reveals Primo's gripping story of his capture and the scary subsequent tenure at the notorious Nazi concentration camp.

featureResponse.title: Prisoners
featureResponse.shortSummary: The abduction of two children prompts father Hugh Jackman to take matters into his own hands in this harrowing thriller.
featureResponse.summary: The mysterious abduction of two children sends both of their families into an unending nightmare as they search for answers. Determined to find his little girl, Hugh Jackman takes things into his own hands with the prime suspect when detective Jake Gyllenhaal and the law fail to come up with any answers. A 'spellbinding, sensationally effective thriller' (Variety).

featureResponse.title: Raging Bull
featureResponse.shortSummary: Martin Scorsese's compelling boxing drama with Robert De Niro as Jake La Motta, a '40s middleweight champ haunted by personal demons.
featureResponse.summary: A tough New York kid brawls his way through the boxing world and life in Martin Scorsese's compelling, angry and poetic drama. Robert De Niro won a 1980 Oscar(R) for Best Actor as Jake La Motta, the '40s middleweight champ who is haunted by personal demons.

featureResponse.title: Raising Cain
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Lithgow tackles multiple roles--and multiple personalities--as a child shrink whose seemingly perfect life hides a twisted truth.
featureResponse.summary: John Lithgow tackles multiple roles--and multiple personalities--in Brian De Palma's thrilling homage to Psycho and Peeping Tom. Lithgow stars as a child shrink with a seemingly perfect life. But beneath the veneer of the doc's brilliant mind lies a scary collection of demented personalities--the result of his father's twisted experiments.

featureResponse.title: Random Hearts
featureResponse.shortSummary: A cop and a congresswoman are connected after their cheating spouses are killed together in a plane crash.
featureResponse.summary: A Washington, D.C., internal affairs cop (Harrison Ford) and a New Hampshire congresswoman (Kristin Scott Thomas) find themselves connected by adultery and death when their cheating spouses are killed in a plane crash. Forced to deal with the stunning discovery, the pair slowly find healing in each other's arms while groping for answers.

featureResponse.title: Recount
featureResponse.shortSummary: Kevin Spacey stars in this gripping film that explores the human drama surrounding the controversial 2000 presidential election.
featureResponse.summary: In 2000, the presidential election boiled down to a few precious votes in Florida--and a mandatory recount that would add 'hanging chad' to the American political lexicon. Haggling over every ballot, Republican and Democratic campaigners waged a 36-day street fight in the Sunshine State--with the presidency of the United States as the ultimate prize.

featureResponse.title: Reds
featureResponse.shortSummary: A world torn by war is the setting for a romance between an idealistic journalist and a woman compelled to prove herself his equal.
featureResponse.summary: A world torn by war and revolution is the epic setting for a romance between an idealistic American journalist and a woman who feels compelled to prove herself his equal. Warren Beatty and Diane Keaton star as the early 20th century radicals John Reed and Louise Bryant. Jack Nicholson plays the dramatist Eugene O'Neill.

featureResponse.title: Red 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: In this high-octane sequel, ex-CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) reunites his old-school crew to track down a missing nuclear device.
featureResponse.summary: In this high-octane sequel to the 2010 action-comedy hit, ex-CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) reunites his old-school crew--all classified as Retired & Extremely Dangerous--to track down a missing nuclear device, clashing with assassins, terrorists and corrupt government officials along the way.

featureResponse.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther
featureResponse.shortSummary: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau is on the trail of an international drug ring in this hilarious 1978 'Panther' film.
featureResponse.summary: Watch out...Inspector Clouseau is on the loose again! This time he's on the trail of an international drug ring, and by the time he's through, everyone needs tranquilizers. Dyan Cannon co-stars in one of the best of the 'Panther' movies.

featureResponse.title: Ride Along
featureResponse.shortSummary: A diminutive security guard who wants to be a real cop goes on the beat with his future brother-in-law--a tough Atlanta PD detective.
featureResponse.summary: Diminutive high-school security guard Ben dreams of becoming a real cop and marrying his girlfriend, whose disapproving brother James is a tough detective with the Atlanta PD. So when Ben enters the police academy, James tries to scare him off by taking him along for a wild ride on the beat that he'll never forget. Ice Cube and Kevin Hart star.

featureResponse.title: The Ringer
featureResponse.shortSummary: An office screwball pretends to be a mentally challenged athlete in order to 'fix' the Special Olympics in this raucous comedy.
featureResponse.summary: An office screwball pretends to be a mentally challenged athlete in order to 'fix' the Special Olympics in this raucous comedy. Johnny Knoxville stars as the incompetent but good-hearted Steve Barker, who enters the Special Olympics intending to beat the odds-on favorite and win a big wager. Just one problem: Steve (a.k.a. 'Jeffy') can barely keep up with his competitors!

featureResponse.title: Rio 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: Blue macaw mates Blu and Jewel go in search of their rain-forest roots on a wild Amazonian adventure in this fun-filled animated sequel.
featureResponse.summary: Blue macaw mates Blu and Jewel go in search of their rain-forest roots on a wild Amazonian adventure in this fun-filled animated sequel. Once in the jungle, the couple and their brood discover a huge pack of wild macaws--led by Jewel's long-lost father--and join them in a battle to save their beautiful habitat from the saws of a devious logging crew.

featureResponse.title: Robots
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young robot with dreams of becoming an inventor must take on a corrupt corporate monolith in this dazzling animated picture.
featureResponse.summary: A robot who dreams of being an inventor takes on a corporation in this animated film. Rodney Copperbottom pursues a job at Bigweld Industries, only to find that it is run by a greedy capitalist and his nasty mum, whose new corporate policy involves junking older robots who can't afford upgraded bodies. It's up to Rodney and his pals to save the day. ROBOTS TM & (C) 2005 Fox.

featureResponse.title: The Rock
featureResponse.shortSummary: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage team up to stop a devious U.S. general's threat to chemically attack San Francisco from Alcatraz Island.
featureResponse.summary: Sean Connery and Nicolas Cage team up to stop a devious U.S. general in this action-thriller. Decorated veteran General Hummel takes civilians hostage for ransom at Alcatraz prison. He threatens a chemical attack on San Francisco if his demands are not met. Out to stop him is an FBI chemical-weapons specialist who is led to Alcatraz by the only man ever to have escaped it!

featureResponse.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
featureResponse.shortSummary: A naive couple stumble into the clutches of the transvestite Dr. Frank N. Furter in this legendary cult musical horror comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Here it is...the cult musical horror comedy that's been packing them in at midnight shows for decades! Dr. Frank N. Furter (Tim Curry) is a transvestite from the planet Transexual in the galaxy Transylvania into whose clutches stumble a naive young couple (played by Susan Sarandon and Barry Bostwick).

featureResponse.title: Rumor Has It
featureResponse.shortSummary: A journalist unearths an amazing family secret: her mother and grandmother may have been the inspiration for 'The Graduate.'
featureResponse.summary: A journalist unearths an amazing family secret: her family may have been the inspiration for the hit book and film 'The Graduate.' Jennifer Aniston stars as Sarah, whose blah fiance and dead-end job make her easy prey for the handsome older man (Kevin Costner) who romanced Sarah's grandmother and late mother, and might add on Sarah...if he doesn't turn out to be her father!

featureResponse.title: Runaway Bride
featureResponse.shortSummary: Serial bride Julia Roberts' habit of leaving men at the altar draws journalist Richard Gere to her small town in this romantic comedy.
featureResponse.summary: She's always a bride, but Maggie Carpenter (Julia Roberts) keeps leaving her hapless beaus at the altar. Enter Richard Gere as a disgraced journalist who sees the skittish hardware-store knockout as his chance at redemption--in his career and perhaps his love life. Joan Cusack, Hector Elizondo, Rita Wilson and Paul Dooley co-star in this hit romantic comedy.

featureResponse.title: Running Free
featureResponse.shortSummary: Lucky the horse narrates his own story in this unique family adventure set before and during World War I in southwestern Africa.
featureResponse.summary: Lucky the horse narrates his own story in this family adventure set before and during World War I in southwestern Africa. Separated from his mother after a difficult journey from Germany to Africa, Lucky grows up with an enemy--the brutal horse Caesar--and human friends, a stable boy and a native girl. His one goal is to find his mother again in this moving, panoramic drama.

featureResponse.title: Running Scared
featureResponse.shortSummary: Undercover cops Gregory Hines and Billy Crystal go toe-to-toe with a drug kingpin in this exciting action-adventure.
featureResponse.summary: Cops Gregory Hines and Billy Crystal, pals on and off their undercover duty, are primed for an early Florida retirement when a drug king thrusts them back into overtime work. Spectacular chases and shoot-outs trace their pursuit through the streets of Chicago, as the two buddies go toe-to-toe with danger one more time.

featureResponse.title: Rush
featureResponse.shortSummary: The heated rivalry between Formula One superstars James Hunt and Niki Lauda bubbles over during the unforgettable 1975 season.
featureResponse.summary: The death-defying world of Formula One racing is the setting for this drama that recalls the heated rivalry between 1970s superstars James Hunt and Niki Lauda. Chris Hemsworth and Daniel Bruhl deliver impassioned performances as handsome wild child Hunt and the brooding, driven Lauda--competitors whose dislike bubbled over amid the tragedy and triumph of the 1975 season.

featureResponse.title: Rush Hour
featureResponse.shortSummary: A no-nonsense Hong Kong detective and a wisecracking LAPD cop team up to investigate a kidnapping in Los Angeles.
featureResponse.summary: Jackie Chan delivers the punches and Chris Tucker delivers the punchlines in this hit action-comedy. When a visiting Chinese official's daughter is kidnapped in Los Angeles, no-nonsense Hong Kong detective Chan flies in to investigate and finds himself teamed up with wisecracking LAPD cop Tucker, who wreaks hilarious havoc on the case.

featureResponse.title: R.I.P.D.
featureResponse.shortSummary: Undead lawmen Jeff Bridges and Ryan Reynolds return from the beyond to save humanity from a supernatural apocalypse.
featureResponse.summary: Undead lawmen Jeff Bridges and Ryan Reynolds return from the beyond to save humanity from a supernatural apocalypse in this thrillride. With ghostly 'deados' unleashing destruction in Boston, it's up to murdered Boston cop Reynolds and Old West sheriff Bridges of the Rest In Peace Department to put the ghouls back in their graves before their evil plan can be realized.

featureResponse.title: Saving Grace
featureResponse.shortSummary: A widow with a mountain of debt is persuaded by her gardener to take the high road and raise some quick cash by growing marijuana plants.
featureResponse.summary: When newly widowed Grace discovers that her late husband left her with a mountain of debt, her gardener persuades her to take the high road and raise some quick cash by growing marijuana plants.

featureResponse.title: Say It Isn't So
featureResponse.shortSummary: A young man is shocked to discover that the love of his life might be his sister in this raucous Farrelly brothers-produced comedy.
featureResponse.summary: For incompetent hairdresser Jo and her unlucky customer Gilly, it's love at first cut...until it turns out they may be related! The adopted Gilly may be the long-lost son of Jo's venal white-trash mother (Sally Field)...or is he? In his quest to legitimize a more than brotherly love for Jo, Gilly heads to Beaver, Oregon, and encounters a pack of screwballs along the way.

featureResponse.title: Scary Movie 2
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Wayans brothers poke fun at horror films once again in this second installment in their hilarious and popular film series.
featureResponse.summary: The Wayans brothers poke fun at horror films once again in this second installment in their hilarious and popular film series. When a screwball group of college kids are lured to an old mansion (which was part of a comical 'Exorcist' parody in the opening scene), it's open season on all the tropes of the genre, from ghosts to deformed handyman.

featureResponse.title: School Ties
featureResponse.shortSummary: Brendan Fraser stars as a Jewish youth who encounters prejudice while attending an exclusive New England prep school in the 1950s.
featureResponse.summary: David fits right in at the exclusive New England prep school he attends on a football scholarship. He's handsome, popular, intelligent and is unstoppable on the field. But how popular would he be if his snobbish friends knew that he's Jewish? Brendan Fraser plays David in this thoughtful look at anti-Semitism in the 1950s.

featureResponse.title: Scooby-Doo
featureResponse.shortSummary: The Mystery Mutt and his pals reunite for a spooky adventure involving ghostly doings at a haunted-house amusement park.
featureResponse.summary: Mystery mutt Scooby-Doo and his human pals from the beloved cartoon series are brought to dazzling life in this live-action feature. The fun begins as the Mystery Inc. gang--Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy and, of course, Scooby-Doo--reunite for a spooky adventure involving a ghostly series of events at a haunted-house-themed amusement park.

featureResponse.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
featureResponse.shortSummary: Monsters from the Mystery, Inc. gang's past return to life to provide Scooby and his groovy sleuth pals with an all-new investigation.
featureResponse.summary: Monsters from the Mystery, Inc. gang's past return to life to provide the groovy sleuths with a new investigation. Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy and Scooby-Doo return to Coolsville when a museum opens a display of monstrous masks from their past conquests. When the ghastly ghouls begin making new appearances, it's up to the 'fraidy cats to get to the bottom of the mystery.

featureResponse.shortTitle: Seeking a Friend for the End of/World
featureResponse.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
featureResponse.shortSummary: Steve Carell and Keira Knightley form an unlikely bond as Armageddon looms in the form of a killer asteroid in this unique, funny tale.
featureResponse.summary: With Armageddon only three weeks off courtesy of a killer asteroid, hapless insurance salesman Steve Carell and quirky cutie Keira Knightley form an unlikely bond. Dodge (Carell) is in a funk; his wife has left him in light of the pending apocalypse. Enter Penny (Knightley), a sprightly 20-something who enjoins him on a road trip that brings them unexpected results.

featureResponse.title: Senseless
featureResponse.shortSummary: A college student volunteers for a medical experiment that gives him superhuman senses--along with some hilarious side effects.
featureResponse.summary: In order to beat a snooty WASP in a competition to win a dream Wall Street job, an underprivileged college student volunteers for a medical experiment that gives him superhuman senses--along with some hilarious side effects.

featureResponse.title: She's Having a Baby
featureResponse.shortSummary: John Hughes comedy about a young couple as they experience the highs and lows of married life and starting a family.
featureResponse.summary: John Hughes ('The Breakfast Club') directed this engaging domestic comedy (Newsday) about a young couple facing the joys and trials of marriage. Kevin Bacon stars as a reluctant husband who'd like to stay a kid forever. Elizabeth McGovern plays his wife. Written and directed by John Hughes.

featureResponse.title: The Shining
featureResponse.shortSummary: Stanley Kubrick's horror classic based on Stephen King's tale of a man's descent into madness while caring for a remote hotel.
featureResponse.summary: 'Here's Johnny!' Jack Nicholson stars in one of his most famous roles as Jack Torrance, the winter caretaker at the Overlook Hotel where the ghosts of horror's past drive him to the brink of murdering his wife and clairvoyant son. An unforgettable horror classic that gets better with every viewing. Shelley Duvall, Scatman Crothers and Danny Lloyd co-star.

featureResponse.title: Short Time
featureResponse.shortSummary: Dabney Coleman stars in this crime comedy about a retiring cop's race to collect line-of-duty insurance for his son's Harvard education.
featureResponse.summary: It's good news/bad news for cop Dabney Coleman in this dizzy crime comedy. Retirement's just days away. That's good. So is death, according to a medical mix-up. That's bad. In a race to collect line-of-duty insurance for his son's Harvard education, Coleman tempts fate with every car chase and shoot-'em-up in the city. A funny, fast time co-starring Matt Frewer.

featureResponse.title: Showtime
featureResponse.shortSummary: Robert De Niro and Eddie Murphy are hilarious as polar-opposite LAPD cops who are forced to team up for a television reality show.
featureResponse.summary: Detective Mitch Preston (Robert De Niro) is a hard-nosed 'Dirty Harry'-style cop. Trey Sellars (Eddie Murphy) is just a goofball in uniform. The pair cant stand each other, but when Mitch gets into trouble for clashing with a TV cameraman, he is forced to participate in a new television reality series...with Mitch as his more-than-willing partner!

featureResponse.title: A Simple Wish
featureResponse.shortSummary: Martin Short is a screwball fairy godmother who becomes the accident-prone answer to a little girl's wish in this comedy.
featureResponse.summary: Martin Short is a screwball fairy godmother who becomes the accident-prone answer to a little girl's wish in this comedy. Eight-year-old Anabel simply wants success for her cab driver father, but oafish Murray (Short) has a broken wand and a propensity for creating a mess. Can he grant her wish while stopping a dastardly witch from ruining the fairy godmother convention?

featureResponse.shortTitle: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
featureResponse.title: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
featureResponse.shortSummary: Four best friends circulate a special pair of jeans during their first summer apart in this adaptation of Ann Brashares's popular novel.
